title: Christ Carrying the Cross, called "The Lord of the Fall"
description: This painting depicts Christ carrying the cross, surrounded by angelic figures and ornate decorations. Christ is centrally positioned, wearing a crown of thorns and a richly patterned robe, with a halo of golden rays. Flanking him are two winged figures holding symbolic objects, and below them are smaller angelic figures and floral arrangements. The composition is highly detailed and symmetrical, creating a sense of solemnity and divine presence.

title: Our Lady of Valvanera
description: The painting depicts the Virgin Mary holding the Christ Child, seated beneath a large tree laden with birds.  A supplicant kneels to the right, while a pastoral scene unfolds in the background with a town, mountains, and a hunter.  The overall composition is rich with detail, featuring a variety of flora and fauna, and a sense of narrative action.

title: Charity
description: The painting depicts a woman tenderly holding two cherubic children. One child sleeps peacefully in her arms, while the other looks up at her face. The composition is centered around the maternal figure, with soft drapery in warm tones surrounding the figures. The background is dark, emphasizing the illuminated subjects.

title: Portrait of Alvise Contarini(?); (verso) A Tethered Roebuck
description: This portrait depicts a man in profile, wearing a black cap and tunic against a bright blue sky with distant clouds and a landscape. The subject's face is rendered with subtle shading, highlighting his features and the flush on his cheeks. The background features a serene body of water with a ship and a shoreline with trees and buildings, creating a sense of depth.

title: Portrait of a Woman, Possibly a Nun of San Secondo; (verso) Scene in Grisaille
description: This portrait depicts a woman with a serene expression, turned to the left, against a backdrop of a landscape with a body of water and distant hills. She wears a dark garment and a white head covering that drapes around her neck and shoulders. The painting utilizes a relatively bright palette, with a clear blue sky and soft, naturalistic rendering of the subject's features and attire.

title: Christ Crowned with Thorns
description: This painting is a close-up portrait of Christ, depicted with a crown of thorns and a sorrowful expression. The lighting is dramatic, casting deep shadows that emphasize the contours of his face and body. His bare chest is rendered with subtle shading, and the dark background isolates him, drawing the viewer's attention to his suffering.

title: Virgin and Child with Four Angels
description: The painting depicts the Virgin Mary holding the Christ child, surrounded by four angels. Two angels above are crowning the Virgin, while two angels below play musical instruments. The scene is set within an architectural framework opening to a detailed cityscape and landscape. Rich red and blue robes dominate the foreground, contrasting with the lighter tones of the angels' garments and the distant scenery.

title: The Martyrdom of Saint Barbara
description: The painting depicts a dramatic scene of martyrdom, with Saint Barbara kneeling in a vibrant red gown. A figure in ornate armor prepares to strike her with a sword, while other figures, including soldiers and onlookers, stand around. The background features a detailed landscape with castles and trees under a bright blue sky. The composition is tightly packed with figures, creating a sense of intensity and narrative focus.

title: Portrait of a Woman
description: This portrait depicts a woman with dark, curly hair and a pale complexion, looking directly at the viewer. She is adorned in rich, dark velvet fabric with intricate lace detailing at her neckline and cuffs. A pearl earring dangles from her ear, and a jeweled brooch is visible on her dress. The lighting highlights her face and the textures of her clothing against a dark, atmospheric background.

title: Josefa de Castilla Portugal y van Asbrock de Garcini (1775-about 1850)
description: This portrait depicts a woman with a cascade of long, wavy blonde hair against a dark, undefined background. She is seated, wearing a white dress that reveals her décolletage, and holds a small, golden fan in her hands. Her gaze is directed slightly away from the viewer, and her cheeks are flushed with a rosy hue. The overall impression is one of gentle repose and perhaps a touch of melancholy.

title: Saint Anthony the Abbot in the Wilderness
description: The painting depicts Saint Anthony the Abbot in a desolate wilderness setting. He stands on a rocky path, leaning on a staff, with a halo of gold leaf. The landscape is barren with leafless trees and a distant castle and church under a dramatic, cloudy sky. A deer and a rabbit are visible in the sparse terrain, emphasizing the solitude of the scene.

title: The Birth of the Virgin
description: This painting depicts a grand architectural setting with numerous figures engaged in various activities, centered around the birth of a child. The composition features a prominent building with classical elements, including columns and arches, and a vibrant blue sky with birds in the upper left. The figures are dressed in richly colored robes, with a focus on the central group attending to the newborn. The overall impression is one of order and ceremony within a detailed, idealized environment.

title: A Peasant Family
description: This painting depicts a peasant family gathered in an interior space, likely a humble home. A man sits on a chair, holding a basket, while children stand around him. One child plays a flute, and another stands to the side. The scene is rendered with a focus on the figures and their simple attire, with a muted color palette and visible brushstrokes.

title: The Holy Family with the Young Saint John the Baptist
description: This painting depicts the Holy Family with the young Saint John the Baptist in an intimate grouping. The figures are rendered with soft, rounded forms, bathed in a gentle light that highlights their features and the rich drapery. The composition is balanced, with the figures forming a cohesive unit, and the colors are deep and resonant, contributing to a sense of solemnity and tenderness. The background is a dark, draped fabric that focuses attention on the central figures.

title: The Penitence of Saint Jerome
description: This triptych depicts religious scenes within expansive, detailed landscapes. The left panel shows the Baptism of Christ, with figures in a river and surrounding greenery. The central panel features Saint Jerome kneeling in penitence before a rocky outcrop, with a vast, rolling landscape and distant architecture. The right panel shows Saint Jerome again, reading a book, with a dark cave and demonic figures behind him. The overall impression is one of detailed naturalism and spiritual contemplation.

title: Great Indian Fruit Bat
description: The painting features a Great Indian Fruit Bat depicted in a naturalistic style against a plain, off-white background. The bat is shown with its wings partially extended, revealing the delicate membrane and skeletal structure. Its fur is rendered in warm brown tones, contrasting with the dark, leathery wings. The composition is dominated by the large form of the bat, which occupies most of the horizontal space.

title: Manuel Osorio Manrique de Zuñiga (1784-1792)
description: The painting depicts a young boy in a vibrant red suit and white sash, standing with a string in his hands. He is surrounded by several cats, a magpie with a note, and a green birdcage containing small birds. The background is dark and muted, drawing attention to the boy and his companions. The overall impression is one of a formal portrait with elements of domestic life and nature.

title: Madonna and Child
description: The painting depicts the Madonna tenderly holding the Christ Child, with both figures rendered in soft, lifelike detail. The Madonna's gaze is downcast, while the child looks directly at the viewer with a serious expression. Rich red and deep green fabrics drape the figures, contrasting with the ornate, gilded background featuring intricate patterns and putti. The composition is intimate, focusing on the maternal bond between the two central figures.

title: Saint Christopher and the Infant Christ
description: The painting depicts Saint Christopher wading through water, carrying the Infant Christ on his shoulders. Saint Christopher is shown with a staff in his left hand, and the Infant Christ holds a globe. The composition is dominated by the figures, with a muted landscape in the background. The colors are earthy and subdued, with a focus on the figures' robes and skin tones.

title: Ia Orana Maria (Hail Mary)
description: The painting depicts a serene scene with figures in a lush, tropical environment. A woman in a vibrant red dress carries a child on her shoulders, while two other women stand in prayerful poses. The composition is rich with foliage and fruit, rendered in bold colors and flattened forms. The overall impression is one of peaceful reverence and a connection to nature.

title: The Coronation of the Virgin
description: The painting depicts the Coronation of the Virgin Mary, with Christ and God the Father placing a crown upon her head. They are seated on clouds, surrounded by angels playing musical instruments and cherubs. The composition is grand and theatrical, with a sense of divine majesty and celestial celebration. The figures are rendered with a soft, idealized quality, and the overall atmosphere is one of reverence and spiritual exaltation.

title: Virgin and Child
description: The painting depicts the Virgin Mary tenderly holding the Christ child. Warm, rich reds and blues dominate the figures' attire, contrasting with the dark, atmospheric background. The composition is centered on the figures, with the Virgin's gaze directed downwards towards the child, creating a sense of intimacy and devotion. Soft light illuminates their faces and bodies, casting subtle shadows that add depth and volume.

title: The Crucifixion with the Virgin and Saint John
description: This painting depicts the crucifixion of Jesus Christ, with the Virgin Mary and Saint John standing at the foot of the cross. The figures are rendered with dramatic lighting, highlighting their emotional states and the stark reality of the scene. The composition is centered on the figure of Christ, with the Virgin and John flanking him, creating a sense of solemnity and grief. The muted color palette and deep shadows contribute to the somber and spiritual atmosphere.

title: Madonna and Child
description: The painting depicts the Madonna tenderly holding the Christ Child, with both figures framed by golden halos. The Madonna's red robe dominates the composition, creating a sense of warmth and reverence. Subtle details of foliage are visible in the background, adding a touch of naturalism to the sacred scene. The overall impression is one of serene devotion and maternal love.

title: The Adoration of the Shepherds
description: This painting depicts a dramatic scene of shepherds gathered around a newborn Christ child, illuminated by a divine light. Figures are arranged in a dynamic, almost swirling composition, with a strong emphasis on expressive gestures and elongated forms. The palette is dominated by deep shadows and rich, earthy tones, punctuated by the vibrant hues of the figures' garments and the ethereal glow surrounding the infant. The overall effect is one of intense spiritual emotion and theatricality.

title: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand Périgord (1754-1838), Prince de Talleyrand
description: This formal portrait depicts Charles Maurice de Talleyrand Périgord standing in an opulent interior, leaning against a pedestal. He is dressed in a dark green coat and black breeches, with white stockings and buckled shoes. The composition is balanced, with busts on either side and a chair to the right, creating a sense of gravitas. The lighting is dramatic, highlighting the subject and casting shadows that add depth and volume.

title: The Meditation on the Passion
description: This painting depicts a somber scene with Christ at the center, slumped in repose, flanked by two elderly figures. The composition is set against a detailed landscape with rocky outcrops and a distant town. The overall mood is contemplative and melancholic, emphasized by the muted color palette and the presence of symbolic elements like a skull and crown of thorns.

title: Portrait of a Woman with a Man at a Casement
description: This Renaissance portrait depicts a woman in profile, adorned with rich red garments and a jeweled headdress, gazing towards a man visible through a casement window. The composition is split, with the woman dominating the right side and the man appearing on the left, creating a sense of connection across the divide. The background reveals a landscape, adding depth and context to the intimate scene. The rich colors and detailed rendering of fabrics and jewelry suggest a portrayal of status and refinement.

title: The Last Communion of Saint Jerome
description: This painting depicts a religious ceremony within a confined interior space. A central figure, likely Saint Jerome, kneels to receive communion from a robed priest, surrounded by other figures in monastic attire. The scene is illuminated by a soft, diffused light, highlighting the solemnity of the moment. The background features a patterned wall and a glimpse of the sky through an opening, contributing to the intimate and devotional atmosphere.

title: Young Man and Woman in an Inn
description: This painting depicts a jovial young man raising a glass, with a woman leaning into him affectionately. They are both dressed in elaborate 17th-century attire, with the man sporting a wide-brimmed hat adorned with feathers. The scene is set in a dimly lit interior, possibly an inn, with a fireplace and shelves visible in the background. The overall mood is one of merriment and camaraderie, enhanced by the warm, expressive faces of the central figures.

title: The Five Points
description: This painting depicts a bustling street scene filled with numerous figures engaged in various activities. Buildings line both sides of the street, creating a sense of depth and urban environment. The overall impression is one of lively chaos and social interaction.

title: Gilbert Stuart
description: This is a portrait of a man with white hair, looking to the left. He is wearing a dark coat and a white cravat. The background is a muted, textured brown. The painting is framed in an ornate gold frame.

title: Saint Rosalie Interceding for the Plague-stricken of Palermo
description: The painting depicts Saint Rosalie ascending into heaven, surrounded by cherubs. Light streams down from above, illuminating the saint and some of the surrounding figures. The composition is dominated by the central figure of the saint and the dynamic arrangement of cherubs, creating a sense of divine intervention and movement. The lower portion of the painting features darker tones and hints of suffering, contrasting with the celestial scene above.

title: The Flagellation; (reverse) The Madonna of Mercy
description: This painting depicts a scene of flagellation, with a central figure bound to a column and surrounded by tormentors. The composition is crowded and dynamic, with figures engaged in various actions of inflicting pain. The lighting creates a dramatic contrast, highlighting the suffering of the central figure. The colors are rich, with dominant reds and blues, and the brushwork suggests a sense of texture and depth.

title: Self-Portrait
description: This self-portrait depicts a young man with tousled hair, looking directly at the viewer with a pensive expression. He is dressed in dark, luxurious clothing, with a ruffled collar and a rich burgundy velvet jacket. The composition is asymmetrical, with the figure leaning against a ledge, creating a sense of movement and engagement. The lighting is dramatic, casting deep shadows that emphasize the contours of his face and the folds of his attire.

title: Saint Francis
description: The painting depicts Saint Francis in a cave, gazing upwards with a look of profound contemplation. A crucifix is visible to the left, with Christ's body rendered in pale tones. Saint Francis's habit is a muted brown, and the scene is dominated by dark, shadowy tones, with a sliver of light breaking through the gloom.  The composition focuses on the emotional intensity of the figure and his spiritual experience.

title: Joan of Arc
description: The painting depicts a young woman in a rustic outdoor setting, looking upwards with an expression of awe or contemplation. She stands in a garden or wooded area, with a stone building and trees surrounding her. To her left, ethereal, translucent figures, possibly divine messengers, are present, adding a spiritual dimension to the scene. The overall atmosphere is one of quiet introspection and a connection to something beyond the earthly realm.

title: Erasmus of Rotterdam
description: This portrait depicts a distinguished man, likely Erasmus of Rotterdam, in a three-quarter profile against a vibrant teal background. He wears a dark cap and a fur-lined robe, with his hands clasped in his lap. The lighting highlights his face and the rich textures of his clothing, creating a sense of gravitas and intellectual depth. A small, inscribed plaque is visible to the left of his head.

title: Portrait of an Old Man
description: This portrait depicts an elderly man with a receding hairline, a prominent beard, and a ruffled collar. The lighting emphasizes the weathered features of his face, with deep-set eyes and wrinkled skin. His attire suggests a formal or distinguished status, with a fur-lined garment visible. The dark background and muted colors create a somber and introspective mood.

title: The Triumph of Fame; (reverse) Impresa of the Medici Family and Arms of the Medici and Tornabuoni Families
description: This circular painting depicts a triumphant procession led by a winged figure atop a globe, surrounded by armored knights on horseback. The scene is set against a serene landscape with a body of water and distant hills.  The figures and horses are rendered with detailed armor and attire, creating a sense of historical grandeur.  The overall composition is rich with detail and symbolic elements, framed by an ornate golden border.

title: Christ Healing the Blind
description: The painting depicts a dramatic scene of Christ healing the blind, surrounded by a crowd of supplicants and onlookers. Christ, in a blue and pink robe, reaches out to touch the eyes of a kneeling man, while others reach towards him with gestures of hope and desperation. The composition is set against an architectural backdrop with classical columns and arches, under a turbulent sky. The figures are rendered with expressive gestures and varied poses, creating a sense of movement and emotional intensity.

title: Portrait of a Woman
description: This is a portrait of a woman depicted from the chest up, framed by ornate architectural elements. She wears a distinctive white headdress and dark clothing, with her gaze directed slightly to the right. Her left hand rests on an open book, adorned with rings, while the background is a dark, indistinct void. The painting utilizes a muted palette with a focus on the subject's face and the richly rendered details of the frame and book.

title: Salisbury Cathedral from the Bishop's Grounds
description: This painting depicts Salisbury Cathedral framed by lush trees, with a tranquil river in the foreground where cows are grazing and drinking. The grand structure of the cathedral dominates the middle ground, its spire reaching towards a sky filled with dramatic clouds. Figures are visible on a path to the left, adding a sense of human presence to the pastoral landscape.

title: Heroic Landscape with Rainbow
description: This painting depicts a vast, idealized landscape under a sky graced by a prominent rainbow.  A classical city with temples and towers is nestled amongst rolling hills and mountains, overlooking a body of water. In the foreground, figures and sheep are gathered in a pastoral scene, with lush trees framing the composition.

title: The Monet Family in Their Garden at Argenteuil
description: This painting depicts a family enjoying a leisurely day in a lush garden. A man in a blue shirt tends to flowers, while a woman and child relax on a blanket under a tree, surrounded by greenery and scattered red blossoms. The scene is rendered with loose brushstrokes, creating a sense of movement and light filtering through the leaves.

title: Cephalus and Procris
description: This painting depicts a tragic scene in a dark forest setting. A man, Cephalus, cradles a mortally wounded woman, Procris, who lies in his arms. Procris is dressed in blue and red, with bloodstains visible on her chest. The composition is dominated by the figures, with the background fading into shadow and hints of moonlight filtering through the trees.

title: Virgin and Child with Saint Anne
description: This painting depicts the Virgin Mary, Saint Anne, and the Christ Child in a tender, intimate grouping. The figures are rendered with soft, rounded forms, and the composition is tightly framed, emphasizing their close connection. The lighting is gentle, highlighting the delicate features of the faces and the folds of the drapery. A deep green background provides a stark contrast to the warm skin tones and the pale white and reddish garments.

title: David
description: The painting depicts a seated figure, likely King David, adorned with a crown and playing a harp. The composition is centered, with the figure occupying the majority of the frame against a rich gold background. The drapery of his robes flows in soft, voluminous folds, rendered in vibrant greens, blues, and reds. The overall impression is one of regal stillness and artistic contemplation, enhanced by the detailed ornamentation and the aged texture of the gold leaf.

title: Bashi-Bazouk
description: The painting features a portrait of a Bashi-Bazouk, a member of irregular Ottoman infantry units. The subject is depicted in profile, adorned with an elaborate, multi-colored turban and a vibrant pink silk garment. He carries a long rifle over his shoulder and ornate weaponry at his side. The background is a dark, muted tone, which serves to highlight the richly textured and colorful attire of the figure.

title: The Immaculate Conception
description: The painting depicts the Virgin Mary, bathed in a golden light, standing on a crescent moon and surrounded by cherubic figures and angels. Her hands are clasped in prayer, and her gaze is directed upwards towards a celestial crown of stars. The composition is dominated by the central figure of Mary, with flanking angels adding to the sense of divine presence. The overall effect is one of serene reverence and heavenly ascension.

title: Portrait of a Carthusian
description: This portrait depicts a man with a prominent beard and a shaved head, wearing a white monastic robe. The subject is positioned centrally, looking directly at the viewer with an intense gaze. The background is a rich, warm red, contrasting with the pale white of his habit, and the entire scene is framed by a dark, textured border. The lighting highlights the contours of his face and the folds of his clothing.

title: Doge Alvise Mocenigo (1507-1577) Presented to the Redeemer
description: The painting depicts a religious scene with figures in elaborate robes and celestial beings. A central figure, likely the Doge, is presented before a divine entity, while other figures engage in devotional acts. The composition is rich with detail, featuring architectural elements and a distant seascape. The interplay of light and shadow creates a dramatic and solemn atmosphere.

title: A Woman with a Dog
description: This portrait depicts a young woman holding a small dog, with her left hand extended outwards. The woman wears a white blouse and a green dress, adorned with a simple necklace. The background is dark and indistinct, focusing attention on the figures. The overall mood is intimate and engaging, with the subjects looking directly at the viewer.

title: The Adoration of the Magi
description: This painting depicts the Adoration of the Magi, with figures gathered around the infant Jesus in a stable. Rich gold leaf forms the background, contrasting with the deep blues, reds, and greens of the figures' robes. Several angels are present, some with outstretched hands, while others are shown in prayer. The composition is balanced, with the central figures of Mary and Jesus forming the focal point.

title: The Glorification of the Barbaro Family
description: This grand ceiling fresco depicts a triumphant procession of figures ascending towards a bright sky, framed by an ornate golden border. Winged figures, cherubs, and a central regal figure adorned with a laurel wreath and a lion's pelt dominate the composition. The scene is filled with swirling clouds and dramatic lighting, suggesting divine favor and worldly power.

title: Cottage Children (The Wood Gatherers)
description: The painting depicts three young children in a natural, somewhat somber landscape. A young girl carries a baby on her hip, while another boy sits to the left, looking outwards. The scene is rendered with a dramatic interplay of light and shadow, highlighting the children against a dark, moody background of trees and sky. The overall impression is one of humble innocence amidst a challenging environment.

title: Virgin and Child with the Young Saint John the Baptist and Angels
description: This painting depicts the Virgin Mary tenderly holding the Christ child, with the young Saint John the Baptist and several cherubic angels surrounding them in a serene, natural setting. The composition is soft and flowing, with a focus on the tender interactions between the figures. The use of light creates a gentle, ethereal atmosphere, highlighting the rosy cheeks of the children and the soft drapery of Mary's robes.  The overall impression is one of gentle affection and divine grace.

title: Antoine Laurent Lavoisier (1743-1794) and Marie Anne Lavoisier (Marie Anne Pierrette Paulze, 1758-1836)
description: This portrait depicts Antoine Laurent Lavoisier and his wife, Marie Anne Lavoisier, in a study filled with scientific instruments. Lavoisier is seated at a table covered with a red cloth, engaged in writing, while his wife stands beside him, resting her hand on his shoulder. The composition is balanced, with the figures and scientific apparatus creating a sense of intellectual pursuit within an interior space. The lighting is somewhat dramatic, highlighting the figures and key objects.

title: The Rest on the Flight into Egypt
description: The painting depicts the Virgin Mary breastfeeding the Christ child while seated in a lush forest setting. A serene landscape with distant architecture unfolds in the background, and a small procession can be seen further into the woods. The composition is anchored by the central figures, with the surrounding trees creating a sense of enclosure and depth.

title: The Card Players
description: This painting depicts four men gathered around a table, engaged in a game of cards. The scene is rendered with visible brushstrokes, creating a textured surface. The figures are depicted in a somewhat somber and focused manner, with muted colors dominating the palette. A draped curtain adds a touch of warmth to the otherwise subdued interior setting.

title: Ignacio Garcini y Queralt (1752-1825), Brigadier of Engineers
description: The portrait depicts Ignacio Garcini y Queralt in a dark military uniform adorned with red accents and medals. He is shown from the chest up, with his gaze directed towards the viewer. The background is dark and indistinct, focusing all attention on the subject. His left hand rests on his hip, while his right hand holds the hilt of a sword.

title: The Storm
description: The painting depicts a man and a woman struggling against a powerful storm, their bodies entwined as they are buffeted by wind and rain. A large, flowing piece of fabric, likely a cloak or sail, billows dramatically above them, catching the light. The background is dark and ominous, with hints of foliage and a turbulent sky, emphasizing the couple's vulnerability and the intensity of the natural forces at play.

title: The Streetwalker
description: The painting features a portrait of a woman with striking, pale skin and bright yellow hair, set against a backdrop of lush, green foliage and a winding path. Her gaze is direct and unblinking, conveying a sense of introspection or perhaps defiance. The brushstrokes are visible and energetic, contributing to a textured and somewhat raw aesthetic. The overall impression is one of a candid, unvarnished portrayal of the subject in a natural setting.

title: The Antechamber of the Sala del Maggior Consiglio
description: This painting depicts an opulent interior space with figures engaged in conversation and movement. The composition is characterized by a grand hall with a high, beamed ceiling and a large arched window.  Warm, earthy tones dominate the scene, punctuated by the rich colors of the figures' attire.  The overall impression is one of stately activity within an impressive architectural setting.

title: Aristotle with a Bust of Homer
description: The painting depicts a contemplative figure, presumably Aristotle, dressed in rich, dark robes and a hat, gazing thoughtfully at a marble bust of Homer. Light dramatically illuminates the faces of both figures and the ornate chain around Aristotle's neck, while the background recedes into deep shadow. The composition is anchored by the central figures, with a sense of quiet introspection and intellectual engagement.

title: Oedipus and the Sphinx
description: The painting depicts a dramatic confrontation between Oedipus and the Sphinx in a rugged, mountainous landscape. Oedipus, a muscular nude figure, gazes intently at the Sphinx, a creature with the body of a lion, wings of a bird, and the head of a woman. The composition is dominated by the figures, with the Sphinx embracing Oedipus while he holds a staff. The background features dark, imposing cliffs and a stormy sky, creating a sense of tension and foreboding.

title: Head of Christ (Ecce Homo)
description: This painting is a close-up portrait of Christ, featuring his face adorned with a crown of thorns from which blood drips onto his forehead. The background is a dark, deep blue with subtle gold decorative elements. The composition focuses intensely on Christ's expression, conveying a sense of suffering and solemnity.

title: Two Men before a Waterfall at Sunset
description: Two men stand on a rocky outcrop, gazing at a majestic waterfall cascading down a cliff face. Towering evergreen trees frame the scene, their dark forms contrasting with the warm hues of the sunset sky. The overall atmosphere is one of serene contemplation amidst the grandeur of nature.

title: The Death of Socrates
description: The painting depicts Socrates in prison, surrounded by his followers, moments before his death. Socrates, seated, reaches for a cup of hemlock, his body illuminated by a dramatic light source. His followers react with grief and despair, some embracing him, others turning away in sorrow. The composition is centered on Socrates, with the surrounding figures creating a sense of emotional intensity within the confined, somber interior.

title: Hermann von Wedigh III (died 1560)
description: This is a formal portrait of a young man, likely a nobleman, set against a vibrant blue background. He is dressed in dark, luxurious clothing with fur trim, and wears a black cap. His gaze is direct and serious, and his hands are positioned holding a small book and resting on a green surface. The painting is meticulously detailed, emphasizing the textures of his attire and the clarity of his features.

title: Wheat Field with Cypresses
description: The painting depicts a vibrant wheat field under a swirling, dynamic sky. Tall, dark green cypress trees dominate the right side of the composition, reaching towards the turbulent clouds. The field itself is rendered in thick impasto strokes of yellow and gold, conveying a sense of movement and texture. Rolling hills in shades of blue and green form the background, adding depth to the scene.

title: The Crucifixion
description: This painting depicts the crucifixion of Jesus Christ, with figures of the Virgin Mary and Saint John on the left, and Saint Jerome on the right. The central figure of Christ is rendered with a pale, emaciated body, while the surrounding figures express grief and devotion. The background features a detailed landscape with architectural elements and a cloudy sky, rendered in a somewhat muted palette.

title: Saint Philip Neri (1515-1595)
description: This is a formal portrait of an older man with a beard, wearing a dark cap and clerical collar. The subject is depicted from the chest up, with his gaze directed slightly off-center. The lighting is dramatic, casting deep shadows and highlighting the contours of his face, particularly his eyes and the texture of his beard. The background is dark and indistinct, focusing all attention on the figure.

title: Clothing the Naked
description: The painting depicts two figures against a dark background. On the left, a half-naked individual with clasped hands and a pained expression looks towards the viewer. To the right, another figure, adorned in a vibrant red garment and a fur hat, extends a white cloth towards the first. The composition is intimate, focusing on the interaction between the two figures and the act of offering clothing.

title: Interior of the Oude Kerk, Delft
description: This painting depicts the vast interior of a Gothic church, characterized by towering columns and arched ceilings. Sunlight streams in from high windows, casting dramatic shadows and illuminating parts of the stone architecture. Small figures, including children and adults, are scattered throughout the space, adding a sense of scale and human presence within the grand setting. The overall impression is one of solemnity and architectural grandeur, with a touch of everyday life.

title: Circus Sideshow (Parade de cirque)
description: The painting depicts a circus scene with figures arranged on a stage and in the audience, rendered in a pointillist style. Warm and cool colors are juxtaposed, creating a vibrant yet somewhat muted atmosphere, with artificial lights casting a glow. The composition is asymmetrical, with a central figure on a platform drawing attention, while the overall scene feels somewhat confined by the stage and the surrounding darkness. The figures are suggested through dots of color, creating a sense of movement and life within the structured environment.

title: Portrait of a Young Man
description: This portrait depicts a young man with auburn hair, looking directly at the viewer. He is dressed in a rich red garment over a dark tunic, with his hand gripping the fabric. The background features a serene landscape with rolling hills, a winding path, and distant trees under a bright blue sky. The overall impression is one of youthful confidence and a connection to the natural world.

title: Christ Blessing
description: The painting depicts a close-up portrait of Christ, framed by an ornate golden arch. His gaze is direct and piercing, with a raised hand in a gesture of blessing. The colors are rich, with warm skin tones contrasting against a deep blue background, all rendered with visible brushstrokes that suggest age and texture.

title: View of the Colosseum and the Arch of Constantine from the Palatine
description: This painting depicts a panoramic view of ancient Roman ruins and buildings under a pale blue sky. The composition is dominated by earthy tones of brown and ochre, with lush green foliage in the foreground. The ruins, including the Arch of Constantine and parts of the Colosseum, are rendered with a sense of historical weight, while the surrounding architecture and natural elements create a layered and textured scene.

title: Two Tritons at the Feast of Acheloüs
description: The painting depicts two muscular, bearded figures, likely Tritons, emerging from water amidst reeds and rocky outcrops. The central figure prominently displays a bounty of seafood, including a crab and fish, held aloft in his arms. In the background, a distant scene of a feast is visible, suggesting a celebratory or mythological context. The overall mood is robust and earthy, with a focus on the figures and their offerings.

title: Cows Crossing a Ford
description: The painting depicts a herd of cattle being guided across a shallow river by two figures on horseback. The scene is bathed in soft, natural light, with a vast sky filled with clouds dominating the upper portion of the canvas. The composition emphasizes the movement of the animals and the expansive landscape, with reflections shimmering on the water's surface.

title: The Adoration of the Magi
description: This painting depicts the Adoration of the Magi, with figures gathered in a dimly lit interior space. The composition is organized around the central figures of Mary holding the infant Jesus, and the kneeling Magi presenting gifts. Rich red and blue fabrics contrast with muted earth tones, and the scene is rendered with visible brushstrokes that create a sense of texture.

title: Still Life with Apples and a Pot of Primroses
description: This still life painting features a collection of apples and a potted plant with primroses arranged on a draped cloth. The background is a muted teal, providing a cool contrast to the warm tones of the fruit. The composition is characterized by a sense of casual arrangement, with the objects appearing to be naturally placed. The lighting is soft, highlighting the forms of the apples and the delicate flowers.

title: Holy Family with an Angel
description: The painting depicts the Holy Family with an angel, set within an architectural archway that frames a distant landscape. The Virgin Mary cradles the Christ child, who reaches towards an angel on the left, while Saint Joseph stands on the right, his gaze cast downwards. Rich blues and warm oranges dominate the figures' attire, set against a backdrop of classical architecture and a serene sky.

title: Portrait of a Young Man; (reverse) Girl Making a Garland
description: This is a portrait of a young person with reddish-brown hair, wearing a dark cap and a brown robe over a white garment. The subject is looking to the left with a slightly parted mouth and blue eyes. The background is a dark, almost black void, which makes the subject's face and clothing stand out. The lighting is focused on the face, creating a sense of intimacy and drawing the viewer's attention to the subject's expression.

title: Gabriel Manigault
description: This is a portrait of a man with fair skin and rosy cheeks, wearing a dark coat and a white cravat. He has a powdered wig and his gaze is directed slightly to the viewer's left. The background is a muted, dark green, creating a sense of depth and focusing attention on the subject. The lighting highlights his face and the texture of his wig.

title: Mrs. Gabriel Manigault
description: This portrait depicts a woman from the bust up, facing forward with a gentle expression. She is adorned in a lustrous white satin gown with intricate lace detailing at the neckline and cuffs. A blue cloak is draped over her left shoulder, and a delicate lace cap frames her face. The lighting highlights the sheen of her attire, creating a sense of elegance and refinement.

title: The Chess Players
description: The painting depicts a group of figures gathered around a chessboard in an interior setting. Two central figures are engaged in the game, while others observe from the sides. The scene is characterized by rich, textured fabrics and the distinctive curly hairstyles of the figures. The overall atmosphere is one of focused attention and quiet contemplation.

title: Scene from a Novella
description: This painting depicts a scene with several figures engaged in conversation or observation within an architectural setting. A central figure, seated on a stone ledge, gestures outwards, while others stand behind. Another figure is visible in an upper window, seemingly engaged in a private moment. The composition utilizes warm, earthy tones, particularly in the brick architecture and the clothing of the figures, contrasted with darker backgrounds and accents.

title: Boating
description: This painting depicts a man and a woman in a rowboat on a bright, blue body of water. The man, wearing a straw hat, is seated and appears to be rowing, while the woman, adorned in a blue dress and elaborate hat, looks away from him. The composition is dominated by the figures and the expansive water, with the boat creating a diagonal line across the scene.

title: The Marriage Feast at Cana
description: This painting depicts a gathering around a table, likely a feast, with several figures engaged in conversation or serving. The scene is set within an architectural space characterized by columns and a patterned wall, with a lush green tapestry hanging in the background. Light falls on the figures and the table, creating a sense of depth and focus, while numerous pottery vessels are visible in the foreground and around the table.

title: Christ Bearing the Cross
description: This painting depicts a crowded procession moving through a detailed cityscape. Christ, in the center, bears a large cross, supported by figures around him. The background features a sprawling city with numerous buildings and a hilly landscape under a dramatic sky. The composition is filled with figures engaged in various actions, creating a sense of movement and narrative.

title: The Harvesters
description: The painting depicts a vast, sun-drenched landscape during harvest season. Figures are scattered across golden fields, engaged in the labor of reaping wheat and resting. Rolling hills, trees, and distant buildings create a sense of depth and a pastoral scene. The overall impression is one of abundance and the cyclical nature of rural life.

title: Virgin and Child
description: The painting depicts a tender moment between the Virgin Mary and the Christ Child. The Virgin gently cradles the child, her cheek touching his, conveying a sense of deep affection and intimacy. The rich blue of her robe contrasts with the soft tones of their skin, while the dark background emphasizes their forms. The composition is intimate and focused, drawing the viewer into the emotional connection between mother and son.

title: The Holy Family with the Infant Saint John the Baptist
description: This painting depicts the Holy Family with the infant Saint John the Baptist in an intimate, indoor setting. The Virgin Mary cradles the Christ child, who is reaching for a bird offered by Saint John. Joseph stands behind them, his gaze directed towards the viewer. The composition is dominated by warm skin tones and rich fabrics, with a dark background that emphasizes the figures.

title: The Crucifixion; The Last Judgment
description: This diptych depicts two contrasting scenes: the Crucifixion on the left and the Last Judgment on the right. The left panel is dominated by the central figure of Christ on the cross, surrounded by a crowd of onlookers and soldiers, with a detailed landscape in the background. The right panel presents a celestial scene with Christ enthroned, accompanied by angels and saints, above a chaotic depiction of hell filled with demons and tormented souls. The overall impression is one of dramatic narrative and stark contrast between salvation and damnation.

title: Salvator Mundi
description: The painting depicts a half-length portrait of Christ, framed within a circular, gilded border. Christ is rendered with a serene expression, holding an orb and a cross, and extending a hand in blessing. The background features a detailed landscape with rolling hills, trees, and a distant castle, rendered in cool blues and greens. The overall impression is one of solemnity and divine authority.

title: Hendrickje Stoffels (1626-1663)
description: This is a portrait of a woman with her head tilted downwards and to the side, her gaze cast downwards. The lighting is dramatic, highlighting her face and shoulders against a dark background. Her clothing appears rich and textured, with a patterned fabric on her left side. The overall mood is introspective and somber.

title: Salvator Mundi
description: The painting depicts a figure, likely Christ, with a serene expression, holding a crystal orb and raising a hand in benediction. The figure is draped in rich blue and red robes against a vibrant green background. The composition is centered, with the figure dominating the frame, and the light highlights the face and hands, creating a sense of divine presence. The details of the hair and drapery are rendered with a sense of volume and form.

title: The Dance Class
description: The painting depicts a group of ballerinas in a dance studio, with some practicing poses while others rest. A male figure, likely an instructor, stands observing them with a cane. The room is painted in muted green tones, with a large mirror reflecting the scene and a window showing a glimpse of the outside. The ballerinas are dressed in traditional white tutus, creating a sense of movement and grace.

title: The Jabach Family
description: This formal group portrait depicts a family in an opulent interior setting. The father, dressed in dark robes, is seated, while his wife and children are arranged around him, with one child being held by the mother and another reaching out. The composition is rich with details like draped fabrics, a bust, books, and a dog, suggesting wealth and intellectual pursuits. The lighting is subdued, casting soft shadows and highlighting the faces and key elements of the scene.

title: Flora
description: The painting depicts a young woman in profile, adorned with a floral headdress and pearls. She wears a voluminous white blouse with ruffled sleeves and a yellow skirt, holding a small bunch of flowers in her left hand. The background is dark and muted, drawing attention to the figure and her gentle gesture. The lighting creates a soft glow on her face and attire, highlighting the textures of the fabric.

title: Head of Christ
description: This devotional portrait presents a frontal view of Christ's head, framed by a golden halo and flanked by two angels. The composition is centered and static, drawing the viewer's attention to Christ's serene yet sorrowful expression. Rich gold leaf dominates the background and halo, creating a sense of divine radiance, while the figures are rendered with muted tones and soft, organic lines.

title: Madonna and Child
description: This painting depicts the Madonna tenderly holding the Christ child, with the child reaching towards her face in a gesture of affection. The figures are rendered with soft, rounded forms, set against a rich, textured gold background. The use of warm colors and the intimate pose create a sense of maternal love and serenity. The overall impression is one of devotional reverence and gentle intimacy.

title: The Annunciation
description: This painting depicts the Annunciation within an interior space, featuring the Archangel Gabriel on the left and the Virgin Mary on the right. Gabriel, adorned in a rich red and gold robe, gestures towards Mary, who is dressed in a blue mantle and white gown. A dove, symbolizing the Holy Spirit, is centrally positioned above Mary, surrounded by a halo. The scene is illuminated by light streaming from a window on the left, casting subtle shadows and highlighting the detailed textures of the fabrics and the tiled floor.

title: Allegory of Music
description: The painting depicts a woman in profile, adorned in draped fabrics of warm ochre and vibrant red, playing a lute. She is surrounded by musical instruments, including a viola da gamba and sheet music, set against a backdrop of classical architecture and a glimpse of nature. The lighting creates a sense of depth and highlights the textures of the fabrics and instruments.

title: A Young Woman as a Shepherdess
description: This oval portrait depicts a young woman adorned with a floral wreath and a delicate veil, holding a staff. Her gaze is directed towards the viewer, with rosy cheeks and a pearl necklace accentuating her features. The lighting creates a dramatic contrast, highlighting her face and attire against a dark background, suggesting a sense of intimacy and focus on the subject.

title: The Lamentation
description: The painting depicts a somber scene with the body of Christ being held by mourners beneath a cross. The composition is centered around the figure of Christ, with figures of Mary, John, and another woman surrounding him. The background features a detailed landscape with buildings and rolling hills. The overall mood is one of grief and reverence, conveyed through the subdued colors and the expressions of the figures.

title: Saint Catherine of Siena Exchanging Her Heart with Christ
description: The painting depicts Saint Catherine of Siena kneeling and holding a bleeding heart, while Christ appears above her, reaching out. The scene is set against a backdrop of stylized architecture, possibly a church or monastery, with a blue sky. The composition is dominated by the figures and the architectural elements, with a strong diagonal implied by Christ's gesture and the saint's gaze.

title: The Judgment of Paris
description: This painting depicts a mythological scene set in a lush, verdant landscape with a castle on a distant cliff. In the foreground, a knight in armor rests while a bearded figure, likely Paris, stands between three nude goddesses. A cherub with a bow and arrow hovers in the sky, suggesting the theme of love and judgment. The composition is rich with detail, featuring a prominent tree on the left and a detailed background with a town by the water.

title: Virgin and Child
description: This painting depicts the Virgin Mary tenderly holding the infant Jesus. The figures are rendered with soft, organic forms against a muted landscape background. The composition is centered and intimate, with the figures dominating the foreground. The lighting is gentle, highlighting the faces and bodies of the subjects.

title: Study for a Portrait of a Woman
description: This portrait depicts a young woman with a gentle gaze, her head turned slightly to the right. Her hair is styled in voluminous curls, framing a fair complexion and rosy lips. She wears a low-cut dress with lace trim, revealing her shoulders and décolletage. The background is a dark, muted tone, which makes the subject's face and attire stand out.

title: Portrait of a Man in a Chaperon
description: This portrait depicts a man from the chest up, wearing a striking red chaperon and dark attire accented with red trim. His gaze is directed to the right, with a subtle expression on his face. He holds a delicate flower in his hands, which are adorned with rings. The background is a dark, deep blue, which makes the subject's features and clothing stand out.

title: Charles Claude de Flahaut (1730-1809), Comte d'Angiviller
description: This portrait depicts a distinguished gentleman with a powdered wig and a refined expression. He is adorned in opulent attire, featuring a vibrant pink silk coat with ornate embroidery and a richly patterned waistcoat. The lighting highlights his face and the textures of his clothing, creating a sense of presence and status against a dark background.

title: Self-Portrait with Two Pupils, Marie Gabrielle Capet (1761-1818) and Marie Marguerite Carraux de Rosemond (1765-1788)
description: This painting depicts a woman artist seated before an easel, holding a palette and brushes, with two young women standing behind her, observing. The central figure is adorned in a voluminous blue gown and a wide-brimmed hat, exuding a sense of grace and focus. The background is dark and indistinct, drawing attention to the figures and the artist's tools, while the overall lighting creates a warm and intimate atmosphere.

title: Francesco d'Este (born ca. 1429, died after 1486)
description: This is a portrait of a young man with a serious expression, looking slightly to the left. He wears dark clothing with a red collar and a gold chain, and holds a small hammer and a ring in his hands. The background is a light, neutral color, and the painting is framed by an ornate gold frame. The subject's features are rendered with fine detail, and the overall impression is one of quiet dignity.

title: Head of Christ
description: This painting features a close-up portrait of Christ, with his head and shoulders filling the frame. His gaze is directed slightly downwards, conveying a sense of solemnity and introspection. The background is dark and indistinct, emphasizing the figure. The ornate frame, inscribed with Latin text, surrounds the central image, adding a decorative and historical context.

title: Teasing a Sleeping Girl
description: The painting depicts a group of people gathered around a sleeping girl, with several individuals playfully teasing her. The composition is dominated by warm, earthy tones, with the central figure of the girl illuminated by a soft light. The expressions of the surrounding figures convey amusement and lighthearted mischief. The scene is set within an interior space, with the figures rendered with visible brushstrokes that add a sense of texture and depth.

title: Diana and Cupid
description: The painting depicts Diana, the Roman goddess of the hunt, in a dynamic pose drawing a bow, while Cupid, the god of love, reaches out to her. They are set against a lush landscape with trees and a cloudy sky, with a dog attentively watching in the foreground. The composition is dominated by the figures of Diana and Cupid, with rich colors and dramatic lighting that emphasizes their forms and the narrative.

title: The Adoration of the Magi
description: The painting depicts the Adoration of the Magi within a crumbling architectural setting. The Virgin Mary cradles the infant Jesus, while the three Magi offer their gifts. Angels observe from above, and a detailed landscape unfolds in the background, populated with small figures and animals. The composition is rich with symbolic detail and a sense of narrative.

title: Christ Blessing, Surrounded by a Donor Family
description: This triptych depicts Christ at the center, blessing and holding a globe, surrounded by members of a donor family. The figures are formally arranged, with rich attire and detailed facial expressions. The composition is balanced, with the central panel drawing the viewer's eye to Christ, while the side panels feature individual portraits. The lighting is even, highlighting the details of the figures and their surroundings.

title: Christ Asleep during the Tempest
description: The painting depicts a dramatic scene of a boat tossed on a stormy sea, with figures desperately clinging to the vessel. Christ, depicted asleep, lies in the center of the boat, a stark contrast to the panic of his disciples. The turbulent water and dark, ominous sky create a sense of chaos and peril, while the figures' varied poses convey fear and struggle.

title: Self-Portrait
description: This self-portrait depicts a man with a prominent forehead and intense gaze, looking directly at the viewer. He is draped in a voluminous gray cloak over a reddish garment, with his left hand resting on a book or scroll. The lighting is dramatic, casting deep shadows that emphasize the contours of his face and the folds of his clothing, creating a somber and introspective mood.

title: Saints Peter and John Healing the Lame Man
description: The painting depicts a dramatic biblical scene on a grand staircase, with figures in flowing robes.  Saints Peter and John are central, reaching out to a lame man who is being helped by others. The composition is rich with architectural elements and a bright blue sky, creating a sense of depth and grandeur. The vibrant colors and clear light highlight the narrative and the emotional intensity of the moment.

title: Lake Fucino and the Abruzzi Mountains
description: This landscape painting depicts a serene lake in the foreground, bordered by a lush green shoreline with scattered trees and fields. Beyond the lake, a series of majestic mountains rise, their slopes rendered in muted tones of brown and gray. The sky above is a pale, hazy blue, with a few wispy clouds adding a touch of softness to the expansive vista. The overall impression is one of tranquil natural beauty and vastness.

title: Don Andrés de Andrade y la Cal
description: This portrait depicts a man in dark attire standing beside a white and brown dog. The man's dark, voluminous hair contrasts with his pale skin and the white collar of his shirt. He holds a dark hat in his left hand, while his right hand rests on the dog's head. The background features architectural elements, including a column and a coat of arms, rendered in muted tones. The overall impression is one of dignified formality.

title: The Lamentation
description: This painting depicts a sorrowful scene with figures gathered around a central, deceased figure. The composition is tightly focused on the emotional expressions of grief and loss, with figures leaning in to support and mourn. The lighting is dramatic, casting deep shadows that enhance the somber mood. The colors are rich yet subdued, emphasizing the gravity of the moment.

title: Portrait of Sor Juana de Nuestra Señora de Guadalupe
description: This is a formal portrait of Sor Juana de Nuestra Señora de Guadalupe, depicted as a young woman wearing a crown and elaborate religious attire. She holds a small statue of the Virgin Mary and Child. The composition is centered and formal, with the subject filling much of the frame against a dark, neutral background. The lighting is soft and illuminates her face and the details of her clothing, creating a sense of solemnity and importance.

title: The Stolen Kiss
description: The painting depicts a clandestine romantic encounter, with a young man leaning in to kiss a woman who looks away with a surprised expression. Another woman reclines in the background, partially obscured by drapery. The scene is set in a dimly lit, intimate space, with rich fabrics and a sense of hurried passion.

title: Study of Water and Plants
description: This painting depicts a tranquil waterscape bordered by lush vegetation. The water on the left reflects the sky and surrounding foliage with soft, horizontal brushstrokes, creating a sense of calm. On the right, dense greenery and plants are rendered with more textured strokes, suggesting the richness of nature. The overall impression is one of a serene, natural environment captured with a keen eye for detail and light.

title: Head of Saint John the Baptist on a Charger
description: This painting depicts the severed head of Saint John the Baptist resting on a golden charger. The subject's eyes are closed, and his face is rendered with a pale, almost deathly pallor, contrasting with his dark, curly hair and beard. The composition is circular, with the head centrally placed within a golden halo or rim, against a dark background that emphasizes the subject.

title: The Annunciation
description: This painting depicts the Annunciation within an interior space. An angel, clad in white and gold, kneels on the left, holding a scepter and a scroll. To the right, the Virgin Mary, in a blue gown, stands with her hands crossed over a book. The scene is rendered with rich colors and detailed architectural elements, suggesting a narrative moment of divine revelation.

title: The Fifteen Mysteries and the Virgin of the Rosary
description: This polyptych is divided into multiple panels, each depicting a scene from the life of Christ and the Virgin Mary, culminating in a central panel featuring the Virgin of the Rosary surrounded by supplicants. The overall palette is rich with deep blues, reds, and golds, creating a sense of solemnity and divine presence. The composition is meticulously detailed, with figures rendered in a somewhat stiff but expressive manner, set against varied backgrounds of interiors and landscapes. The lighting is generally even, illuminating the narrative scenes clearly.

title: The Baptism of Christ
description: This painting depicts the baptism of Christ, with John the Baptist pouring water over Jesus' head. An angel hovers above, holding a white cloth, while a dove descends from a heavenly light. The scene is framed by an ornate arch and flanked by classical sculptures, suggesting a grand and significant event. The figures are rendered with a sense of movement and emotion, set against a naturalistic background.

title: Crucifix
description: This crucifix painting features Christ on the cross, flanked by the Virgin Mary and St. John, with figures of saints at the top and bottom. The composition is dominated by the central figure of Christ, rendered with a somber expression and detailed musculature. The painting utilizes a rich gold background and deep blues and reds for the garments, creating a sense of sacredness and depth. The overall impression is one of solemnity and religious devotion.

title: The Nativity with Donors and Saints Jerome and Leonard
description: This triptych painting depicts the Nativity scene centrally, flanked by donor portraits and saints. The central panel features the Virgin Mary and Joseph in adoration of the infant Jesus, with angels overhead and a cow and donkey present. The left panel shows Saint Jerome with a donor, and the right panel displays Saint Leonard with another donor. The background reveals architectural ruins and a distant landscape with sheep.

title: The Forest in Winter at Sunset
description: The painting depicts a dense, dark forest with bare, gnarled trees silhouetted against a muted, cloudy sky. The composition is dominated by the intricate network of branches, creating a sense of depth and enclosure. Subtle hints of warm light, possibly from the setting sun, pierce through the gloom, illuminating small patches of the forest floor and the undersides of branches. A small flock of birds is visible in the distance, adding a touch of movement to the otherwise still scene.

title: Virgin and Child
description: This painting depicts the Virgin Mary breastfeeding the Christ child, framed by an ornate, arched border. The figures are rendered with a serene and tender expression, set against a golden, textured background. The rich blue of Mary's robe contrasts with the warm tones of the background and the child's skin, creating a devotional atmosphere.

title: Still Life of Grapes and Peaches
description: This still life painting features a bountiful arrangement of grapes and peaches presented on a dark, ornate pedestal. The fruits are depicted with a sense of volume and texture, illuminated by a soft light that casts subtle shadows. A lone bee hovers near the grapes, adding a touch of naturalistic detail to the scene. The dark background and muted tones create a rich, intimate atmosphere.

title: Portrait of a Woman, Probably Susanna Lunden (Susanna Fourment, 1599-1628)
description: This portrait depicts a woman draped in dark fabric, with a sheer veil covering her head and shoulders. Her fair skin and pearl necklace stand out against the dark attire, illuminated by a soft, directional light. Her gaze is directed towards the viewer, and her hands are delicately posed, one adjusting the veil. The background is dark and indistinct, focusing all attention on the sitter.

title: Madonna and Child with the Infant Saint John the Baptist
description: The painting depicts the Madonna holding the Christ child, with the infant Saint John the Baptist kneeling beside them. They are set within a lush, somewhat dark landscape with trees framing the scene and a distant view of rolling hills. The figures are rendered with soft, rounded forms, and the colors are rich, with the Madonna's red robe and blue drapery being prominent.

title: Carlo Rimbotti (1518-1591)
description: This portrait depicts a man with a prominent beard and intense gaze, holding a book. The composition is tightly framed, focusing on the subject's face and upper body. The lighting creates a dramatic contrast, highlighting the man's features against a dark background. The colors are muted, contributing to a somber and serious mood.

title: Portrait of a Man in Armor with Two Pages
description: This painting depicts a commanding figure in ornate armor, flanked by two pages in a landscape setting. The central figure's gaze is directed forward, while one page attends to his armor and the other holds a helmet. The background reveals a vast army arrayed in formation under a dramatic sky, suggesting a scene of military preparation or review. The overall mood is one of authority and solemnity, underscored by the rich textures and deep shadows.

title: The Old Italian Woman
description: The painting depicts an elderly Italian woman seated, draped in a yellow shawl that covers much of her body and head. Her face, etched with wrinkles, is turned slightly towards the viewer, conveying a sense of weariness or contemplation. The background suggests an outdoor setting with hints of buildings and foliage, while a large jug sits to her right. The overall impression is one of quiet dignity and the passage of time.

title: The Musicians
description: The painting depicts a group of young figures engaged in making music, with one playing a lute and another holding sheet music. Rich red drapery cascades across the figures, contrasting with the pale skin tones and white garments. The composition is intimate and focused on the musicians, with a dark, indistinct background that emphasizes their presence. The lighting creates a sense of depth and highlights the textures of the fabrics and instruments.

title: A Musician and His Daughter
description: This painting depicts a musician and his daughter in an interior setting. The musician, dressed in dark, elaborate clothing, holds a lute, while his daughter stands beside him in a richly patterned dress. The composition is balanced, with the figures placed in a way that draws the viewer's eye across the scene. The lighting creates a sense of depth and highlights the textures of their attire.

title: Chancellor Leonhard von Eck (1480-1550)
description: This is a portrait of a man with his arms crossed, looking to the right. He wears a red cap and a light-colored, ruffled garment. The background is a dark, plain expanse, which makes the figure stand out. The lighting is focused on his face and upper body, creating a sense of depth and presence.

title: The Servant Justified
description: This painting depicts a romantic scene in a lush garden setting, with two figures interacting amidst foliage and classical statuary. A man in a red coat leans towards a seated woman in a blue dress and yellow skirt, offering her flowers. The background features trees, a large urn on a pedestal, and a glimpse of a building with a figure looking out a window. The overall atmosphere is one of pastoral romance and gentle interaction.

title: Queen Charlotte
description: This portrait depicts Queen Charlotte with a gentle gaze directed to her left. She wears an elaborate, lace-like headdress and a dark, textured garment that contrasts with her pale skin and delicate pearl necklace. The lighting softly illuminates her face, creating a sense of intimacy against a dark, muted background.

title: Portrait of a Boy
description: This portrait depicts a young boy dressed in elaborate clothing, including a turban and a decorative vest, kneeling on a patterned rug. He holds a colorful ball in one hand and is surrounded by toys, including a doll lying on its side. The background is dominated by dark, draped fabric, creating a somber and intimate atmosphere. The lighting highlights the boy's face and the textures of his attire and toys, drawing the viewer's attention to the central subject.

title: The Musician
description: A woman is depicted playing a lute, with a cello resting beside her. She is dressed in a low-cut blue and white gown, with her gaze directed upwards and to the left. The background features a landscape under a dramatic sky, with a large urn or pedestal to her left. The overall impression is one of serene musical contemplation.

title: Madonna and Child with Saints
description: The painting depicts the Madonna and Child seated centrally under a large tree, surrounded by several saints and angels. The figures are arranged in a harmonious composition within a lush, detailed landscape featuring a distant castle and rolling hills. The vibrant colors and meticulous rendering create a serene and sacred atmosphere, with a peacock perched on a branch adding a touch of symbolic richness.

title: Abraham
description: The painting depicts a seated figure, likely Abraham, with a younger supplicant kneeling before him. The central figure is adorned in flowing robes of pink and green, holding a symbolic object with a fiery red element. The background is dominated by a rich, textured gold leaf, with a decorative halo around the seated figure's head. The composition is anchored by the strong vertical presence of Abraham, balanced by the kneeling figure.

title: Portrait of a Young Man
description: This portrait depicts a young man in profile, facing left, against a dark blue background. He wears a distinctive reddish-pink cap and a dark green tunic adorned with decorative trim and hanging ties. The lighting highlights the contours of his face and hair, creating a sense of gentle modeling. The overall impression is one of youthful elegance and refined presentation.

title: Springtime
description: This painting depicts a romantic scene of a couple on a swing in a lush, verdant forest setting. The man, dressed in earthy tones, embraces the woman, who is draped in flowing white fabric. Sunlight filters through the dense foliage, illuminating the figures and creating a sense of intimacy and enchantment. The overall impression is one of idyllic natural beauty and tender affection.

title: The Vocation of Saint Aloysius (Luigi) Gonzaga
description: This painting depicts a celestial vision where an angel presents a crucifix to Saint Aloysius Gonzaga, who is dressed in religious attire. Above them, cherubic figures sing and play musical instruments, bathed in a heavenly light. The composition is anchored by the figures in the foreground, with architectural elements and a distant landscape providing context. The overall mood is one of spiritual revelation and divine calling.

title: Saint Romuald
description: This portrait depicts a bearded figure, likely Saint Romuald, rendered in a predominantly muted palette. The figure is clad in a simple, light-colored robe, and holds a book in his left hand. A golden halo encircles his head, adorned with a decorative vine motif. The painting exhibits significant craquelure, giving the surface a textured, aged appearance.

title: Judith with the Head of Holofernes
description: The painting depicts Judith, a biblical heroine, holding a sword aloft and standing over the severed head of Holofernes. She is adorned in rich, ornate clothing and a feathered headdress, with a stern yet composed expression. The dark background emphasizes the figure and the dramatic subject matter, while the detailed rendering of textures and jewels highlights the opulence of her attire.

title: Saint Francis in Ecstasy
description: The painting depicts Saint Francis in a state of religious ecstasy, kneeling and gazing upwards at a crucifix held in his hands. He is dressed in a simple brown robe, with a rope belt cinched at his waist. The background features a dramatic sky with clouds and a rocky, natural landscape, accentuated by foliage and a skull in the foreground. The lighting creates a strong contrast, highlighting the saint's face and the crucifix.

title: A Benedictine Monk
description: This is a portrait of an elderly Benedictine monk, depicted from the chest up. His gaze is directed downwards and to the left, conveying a sense of introspection or solemnity. The painting utilizes a limited palette dominated by dark, earthy tones, with the monk's face and hair being the primary focal points. The background is dark and indistinct, emphasizing the figure.

title: The Man of Sorrows
description: This painting depicts a sorrowful Christ, crowned with thorns and displaying wounds from his crucifixion. His body is rendered with a pale, emaciated appearance, emphasizing his suffering. A figure in a monk's habit is visible to the left, looking upwards in prayer. The composition is framed by an ornate, gothic-inspired arch and border, with a dark, textured background.

title: Benedikt von Hertenstein (born about 1495, died 1522)
description: This is a formal portrait of a young man, Benedikt von Hertenstein, set against a dark background. He is adorned in rich clothing, including a red cap and a black tunic with pink and black striped sleeves. His gaze is directed slightly to the viewer's left, and his right hand rests on his hip, displaying rings and a decorative clasp. Above him, a detailed frieze depicts a procession of figures and a chariot, adding a historical or allegorical dimension.

title: A Man Seated and Asleep
description: This painting depicts a man seated and asleep, his face partially obscured by shadow and his hand resting near his mouth. The composition is dominated by dark, rich tones, with the man's figure occupying the majority of the canvas. The background features vertical lines suggesting a weathered wooden surface or perhaps a window frame. The lighting creates a sense of intimacy and quietude, highlighting the man's relaxed posture.

title: Mary of Burgundy
description: This portrait depicts a woman in profile against a vibrant blue background. She wears a distinctive headdress, a dark veil, and ornate jewelry, including a prominent brooch and layered necklaces. Her clothing features rich fabrics with intricate patterns and textures, suggesting a person of status. The lighting is soft, illuminating her face and attire with a gentle glow.

title: Christ on the Cross
description: The painting depicts Christ on the cross, rendered with a stark realism that emphasizes his suffering. The composition is centered on the figure of Christ, with the cross forming a strong vertical and horizontal axis. The lighting creates a dramatic contrast, highlighting the musculature and wounds of Christ's body. The overall impression is one of solemnity and intense emotion, with the dark wood of the cross and the pale flesh of Christ dominating the visual field.

title: Margherita Gonzaga (1591-1632), Princess of Mantua
description: This is a formal portrait of a young woman, likely Margherita Gonzaga, Princess of Mantua. She is adorned in an elaborate, richly patterned gown and a high, ruffled collar, accessorized with pearls and jewels. The subject is positioned slightly off-center, gazing towards the viewer with a gentle expression. The dark background emphasizes her presence and the intricate details of her attire.

title: Portrait of a Man
description: This is a formal portrait of a man, likely a self-portrait, depicted from the chest up. He gazes directly at the viewer with an intense expression, his head turned slightly to the left. The background is a dark, muted tone, allowing the subject's face and dark attire to dominate the composition. The lighting highlights his features, creating a sense of depth and gravitas.

title: Madonna and Child
description: This painting depicts the Madonna tenderly holding the Christ child. The figures are rendered with soft, rounded forms, bathed in a gentle light that highlights their features. A serene landscape unfolds behind them, with rolling hills under a pale blue sky. The composition is intimate, focusing on the maternal bond between mother and child.

title: Venus and the Lute Player
description: This painting depicts Venus reclining languidly, adorned with pearls, while a lute player serenades her. A cherubic figure hovers above Venus, offering a floral wreath, and a lush landscape unfolds in the background. The composition is rich with draped fabrics and musical instruments, creating an intimate and sensual atmosphere.

title: Pope Clement X (1590-1676)
description: This is a formal portrait of Pope Clement X, depicted from the chest up. He wears a red velvet cap and robes trimmed with white fur, characteristic of his office. The lighting emphasizes his face, highlighting his aged features and direct gaze, while the dark background creates a sense of gravitas and focus on the subject.

title: The Holy Family
description: This painting depicts the Holy Family in an interior setting with a still life in the foreground. The Virgin Mary is shown breastfeeding the Christ Child, who holds an orange. To the left, a man, likely Saint Joseph, looks on while holding a scroll and spectacles. The composition is rich with symbolic elements, including fruit and a glass of wine, rendered with meticulous detail and a somber color palette.

title: Flowers in a Grotesque Vase
description: This still life painting features a lavish arrangement of various flowers, including lilies, tulips, and a peony, set in an ornate, grotesque-style vase. The composition is rich with detail, showcasing a butterfly resting on a dark iris and a single apple at the base. The overall impression is one of opulent natural beauty, rendered with meticulous attention to texture and form against a dark, muted background.

title: Saint Lawrence Enthroned with Saints and Donors
description: This painting depicts Saint Lawrence enthroned, flanked by two standing saints and two kneeling donors. The central figure is seated on a grand throne, adorned in rich, dark green robes with intricate gold detailing. The surrounding figures wear vibrant red and pink garments, creating a striking contrast against the gilded background. The composition is balanced, with the figures arranged symmetrically around the central saint, and the overall impression is one of solemnity and reverence.

title: A River in a Meadow
description: This painting depicts a serene river flowing through a lush meadow, framed by dense trees on either side. A winding path leads the viewer into the scene, where a solitary figure walks near the water's edge. The sky above is filled with dramatic clouds, suggesting a dynamic atmosphere. The overall impression is one of natural beauty and quiet contemplation.

title: The Fortune-Teller
description: This painting depicts a group of five figures in a dimly lit interior. The central figures are a young man and woman, engaged in conversation with an older, fortune-telling woman. The composition is rich with detailed clothing and fabrics, featuring a mix of warm and cool tones against a dark background. The lighting creates a sense of drama, highlighting the faces and hands of the figures.

title: The Last Judgment
description: The painting depicts a dramatic scene of the Last Judgment, with Christ at the apex surrounded by angels and cherubs. Below him, a multitude of souls are being resurrected and judged, with some ascending and others descending.
