The composition is highly organized, with a clear division between the heavenly realm above and the earthly realm below, creating a sense of both grandeur and chaos.

title: Woman Playing a Guitar
description: This painting depicts a woman with curly, dark hair playing a lute. She is dressed in a flowing, off-the-shoulder garment with rich fabric textures. The lighting is dramatic, casting deep shadows and highlighting her face and hands as she strums the instrument. The background is dark and indistinct, focusing all attention on the central figure and her musical performance.

title: Portrait of a Woman
description: This portrait depicts a woman from the shoulders up, framed within an arched architectural element. Her gaze is directed to the right, away from the viewer, with a calm and serene expression. The painting features a limited but rich color palette, with warm ochres and browns dominating the background and clothing, contrasted by the deep black of her headdress and the vibrant red of her garment. The lighting is soft, highlighting her face and the delicate details of her jewelry.

title: Saint Michael
description: The painting depicts Saint Michael in full armor, standing triumphantly over defeated demons. He holds a spear and a shield, with a halo encircling his head and large feathered wings spread behind him. The background is richly decorated with gold leaf and intricate patterns, featuring peacock feathers. The scene is set against a patterned floor, with the saint's feet crushing the monstrous figures.

title: Christ's Descent into Hell
description: This painting depicts a chaotic and hellish landscape filled with tormented souls and demonic figures. A central, cavernous mouth-like structure dominates the mid-ground, spewing forth a river of darkness. Fires rage in the background, illuminating a scene of despair and suffering, while grotesque creatures lurk in the shadows and rocky outcrops.

title: Man in Prayer
description: This portrait depicts a middle-aged man with thinning hair and a furrowed brow, his hands clasped in prayer. He is dressed in a dark, fur-trimmed garment, and his gaze is directed downwards with a solemn expression. The background is a deep, dark void, which serves to highlight the subject's face and hands. The lighting is soft, creating subtle shadows that emphasize the contours of his features.

title: Vanitas Still Life
description: This vanitas still life features a prominent skull at the center, flanked by a tulip and a small flower on the left, and a chalice on the right. Coins are scattered across a ledge below the skull, and the scene is framed by architectural elements. A reflective surface above the skull hints at a broader, perhaps cosmic, context, with faint figures present in the upper corners.

title: Head of a Donor
description: This portrait depicts a middle-aged man in profile, with a hand resting on his head. The subject's weathered face is rendered with fine lines, suggesting age and experience. He wears a blue garment with a yellow collar, set against a dark background with hints of red and green. The painting exhibits significant craquelure, indicating its age.

title: The Penitent Magdalen
description: The painting depicts Mary Magdalene in a state of penitence, with her head bowed and hand on her chest. She is surrounded by cherubic figures, one of whom holds a crown of thorns. The composition is rich with dramatic lighting that highlights the figures against a dark background, emphasizing the emotional weight of the scene. A skull and an open book with a crucifix are placed in the foreground, symbolizing mortality and faith.

title: The Flagellation
description: This painting depicts a scene of flagellation with Christ at the center, bound to a column. He is surrounded by three figures, one of whom is about to strike him with a bundle of reeds, while another stands by with a similar implement. The figures are rendered with a focus on their actions and expressions, set against a textured gold background. The composition is tightly framed, emphasizing the dramatic and painful nature of the event.

title: Young Woman with a Pink
description: This portrait depicts a young woman with a pale complexion, dark hair, and a serene expression, holding a pink flower. She is dressed in a rich red gown with dark striped detailing on the bodice and wears a delicate necklace. The composition is framed by an arched architectural element, with a draped cloth and a landscape visible in the background. The lighting is soft, highlighting the subject's face and the delicate details of her attire and the flower.

title: The Pérussis Altarpiece
description: This triptych features religious figures and symbolic elements against a gold background and a detailed landscape. The central panel depicts a crucifixion scene with angels, while the side panels show Christ and a saint kneeling, flanked by heraldic shields and cherubic figures. The overall composition is balanced, with a clear narrative unfolding across the panels, drawing the viewer into a devotional space.

title: Horsewoman
description: A woman in a dark coat and green hat rides a dappled horse through a landscape. The horse is captured mid-stride, with one foreleg raised, suggesting movement. The background features rolling green hills under a dramatic, cloudy sky. The overall impression is one of elegant equestrian activity against a moody natural backdrop.

title: The Crucifixion
description: This painting depicts the crucifixion of Jesus Christ with three figures surrounding the cross. The central figure of Christ is rendered in pale tones, with a crown of thorns and a loincloth. To the left, two women in muted green and blue robes appear to be mourning, with one looking down and the other reaching out. To the right, another figure in green, possibly John the Evangelist, gazes upwards with a book in hand. The background is a textured, golden hue, creating a stark contrast with the somber figures.

title: Noah
description: The painting depicts a seated figure, likely Noah, holding a model of an ark. The figure is dressed in a vibrant blue robe and a red cloak, set against a richly textured gold background. The composition is centered, with the figure occupying the majority of the frame. The overall impression is one of solemnity and historical significance, enhanced by the aged appearance of the materials.

title: Charles I (1600-1649), King of England
description: This portrait depicts King Charles I standing regally, adorned in a richly patterned red suit with intricate gold embroidery. He holds a scepter in his left hand, with a crown and orb to his side, emphasizing his royal status. The background features deep green drapery and a classical column, creating a formal and imposing atmosphere. The lighting highlights the King's figure against the darker background, drawing attention to his attire and regal bearing.

title: Philip IV (1605-1665), King of Spain
description: This is a formal portrait of King Philip IV of Spain, depicted standing and dressed in dark, opulent attire adorned with a prominent gold chain. His posture is upright and commanding, with one hand holding a piece of paper and the other resting near his side. The background is a muted, dark tone, which serves to highlight the figure and the rich textures of his clothing, including the crisp white collar and the velvet cloak.

title: Jean Marc Nattier (1685-1766)
description: This is a portrait of a man with a powdered wig, dressed in 18th-century attire. He is seated and looking towards the viewer with a gentle expression. The background is dark and indistinct, focusing all attention on the subject. The lighting highlights his face and the textures of his clothing, creating a sense of presence and depth.

title: Don Gaspar de Guzmán (1587-1645), Count-Duke of Olivares
description: This equestrian portrait depicts Don Gaspar de Guzmán, Count-Duke of Olivares, on a rearing white horse. He is clad in ornate armor and a wide-brimmed hat, holding a baton. The background features a dramatic landscape with stormy skies and a dark forest on the right. The composition emphasizes the power and status of the subject, with the horse's dynamic pose and the rich details of his attire.

title: Saint Catherine of Alexandria
description: The painting depicts a crowned figure, Saint Catherine of Alexandria, holding a palm frond and a book. The figure is rendered with soft features and wears richly patterned robes in blue and pink, adorned with gold embellishments. A golden halo surrounds her head, and the background is a luminous gold, suggesting a sacred or divine presence. The composition is frontal and centered, creating a sense of solemnity and focus on the saint.

title: Christ Crowned with Thorns (Ecce Homo), and the Mourning Virgin (Mater Dolorosa)
description: This painting depicts Christ, crowned with thorns and bearing wounds, standing beside the sorrowful Virgin Mary. The figures are framed by an ornate architectural setting, with a detailed landscape visible in the background. The composition is balanced, with Christ on the left and Mary on the right, separated by a column. The lighting is dramatic, casting deep shadows and highlighting the emotional intensity of the scene.

title: Moses
description: The painting depicts a seated figure, Moses, holding two tablets inscribed with text. He is draped in flowing blue and pink robes against a gold background, framed by an arched structure. The composition is centered and formal, with the figure dominating the space. The overall impression is one of solemnity and historical importance, enhanced by the rich colors and the aged appearance of the artwork.

title: Pope Benedict XIV (Prospero Lambertini, 1675-1758)
description: This is a formal portrait of Pope Benedict XIV, depicted from the chest up. He wears traditional papal vestments, including a red cap and a richly decorated red robe trimmed with white fur. The lighting emphasizes his face, creating a sense of gravitas and authority against a dark, textured background.

title: The Crucifixion
description: This painting depicts the crucifixion of Jesus Christ, with his body rendered in pale tones against a dark, atmospheric background. The composition is dominated by the verticality of the cross and the outstretched arms of Christ, creating a powerful and somber focal point. The lighting is dramatic, casting deep shadows and highlighting the suffering of the figure, while the distant landscape adds a sense of desolate realism.

title: A Book Peddler
description: This painting depicts a young boy dressed in dark clothing and a wide-brimmed hat, standing with a walking stick and a basket. He holds a stack of newspapers, suggesting his profession as a peddler. The background features a cloudy sky and a hint of a landscape, with a building facade to the left. The overall mood is somewhat somber, with a focus on the solitary figure.

title: The Horse Fair
description: This painting depicts a bustling horse fair with numerous horses and handlers in motion. The scene is dominated by powerful horses, some rearing and others being led, creating a sense of energetic chaos. The background features trees and a cloudy sky, contributing to a naturalistic setting. The overall impression is one of raw power and lively activity.

title: Saint Maurice
description: The painting depicts Saint Maurice in full, ornate armor, holding a banner and a sword. He is presented in a formal, frontal pose against a backdrop of lush greenery and a distant landscape. The armor gleams with polished metal and intricate details, reflecting light and highlighting the figure's imposing presence. The rich colors and detailed rendering contribute to a sense of solemnity and grandeur.

title: Bust-Length Study of a Man
description: This painting is a bust-length portrait of a man with dark skin and hair. The composition is asymmetrical, with the subject's face turned slightly to the left, creating a sense of depth. The lighting is dramatic, casting deep shadows across the man's face and highlighting his features. The background is muted and indistinct, focusing all attention on the subject. The lower portion of the painting appears unfinished, revealing the canvas beneath the paint.

title: The Agony in the Garden
description: The painting depicts a dramatic scene with a central figure kneeling and reaching towards an angel descending from a celestial cloud filled with cherubs. Below, three figures are shown sleeping, draped in rich fabrics. The composition is dominated by a dark, earthy palette, with warm tones of brown and ochre contrasting with the deep blues and reds of the figures' clothing. The lighting creates a sense of divine intervention and earthly slumber, emphasizing the emotional weight of the moment.

title: A Knight of Alcántara or Calatrava
description: This portrait depicts a formally dressed man standing with a hat in his left hand. He wears dark clothing adorned with intricate white patterns on his sleeves and a cape. His long, dark hair frames his face, and he holds a white handkerchief in his right hand. The background is a muted, dark tone, emphasizing the subject.

title: Virgin and Child
description: This painting depicts the Virgin Mary tenderly breastfeeding the Christ child. The figures are rendered with soft, rounded forms, set against a serene landscape background. The composition is intimate and focused on the maternal bond, with warm colors and gentle lighting contributing to a sense of peace and devotion. The painting is framed by an ornate, aged golden border.

title: The Natchez
description: The painting depicts two figures, likely Indigenous Americans, in a natural landscape. One figure, adorned with feathers, cradles a baby wrapped in red cloth, while the other reclines nearby, gazing downwards. The composition is set against a dramatic sky and a body of water, with a canoe and tools scattered on the ground, suggesting a narrative moment of tenderness and perhaps hardship.

title: The Nativity
description: This painting depicts the Nativity scene within a ruined architectural structure, with a serene landscape visible through arched openings. The central figures of Mary, Joseph, and the infant Jesus are bathed in a gentle light, surrounded by two angels and observed by figures outside the immediate scene. The composition is balanced, drawing the viewer's eye to the holy family, while the muted color palette and subtle shadows contribute to a sense of quiet reverence.

title: Arcadia
description: The painting depicts three nude figures in a lush, green landscape. One figure stands playing a flute, while two others recline on the grass. The scene is bathed in soft, natural light filtering through the trees, creating a serene and idyllic atmosphere. The overall impression is one of pastoral tranquility and classical harmony.

title: The Disillusioned Medea
description: The painting depicts a young woman with a pensive expression, leaning her head on her hand. She is adorned with a floral crown and draped in rich fabrics of blue and gold. Behind her, classical sculptures and architectural elements create a somber and reflective atmosphere. The lighting is subdued, casting soft shadows and highlighting the subject's emotional state.

title: The Dormition of the Virgin; (reverse) Christ Carrying the Cross
description: This painting depicts a solemn scene with multiple figures gathered around the Virgin Mary, who is seated and looking downwards. The composition is rich with folds of fabric in deep reds, greens, and blues, set against a gilded background. A single candle casts a warm glow on the central figures, illuminating their faces and hands. The overall impression is one of quiet reverence and spiritual contemplation.

title: Head of a Bishop
description: This painting is a close-up portrait of an elderly bishop, depicted in profile. He wears a tall, white mitre adorned with a jewel, and his face is framed by a long, white beard and flowing hair. The bishop's attire includes rich red and gold garments, suggesting his high status. The lighting creates a dramatic effect, highlighting his weathered features and the textures of his clothing and beard against a dark background.

title: Madonna Adoring the Child with the Infant Saint John the Baptist and an Angel
description: The painting depicts the Virgin Mary kneeling in prayer before the Christ Child, who is held by an angel. The figures are arranged in a serene, contemplative scene set against a distant landscape. Rich blues and reds dominate the attire of the figures, contrasting with the soft greens of the foreground and the muted blues of the sky. The composition is carefully balanced, drawing the viewer's eye to the central figures.

title: Madonna and Child with Saints
description: The painting depicts a serene grouping of figures, centered around the Madonna holding the Christ child and reading from a book.  Surrounding them are several saints, including one prominently kneeling and gesturing towards the central figures. The composition is rich with draped fabrics and detailed facial expressions, set against a dark, atmospheric background.  A large cross is visible on the right side, adding a symbolic element.

title: The Crucifixion with Donors and Saints Peter and Margaret of Antioch
description: This painting depicts the crucifixion of Christ with two other figures on crosses, flanked by mourners and donors. The central figure of Christ is rendered with a pale complexion, while the surrounding figures wear richly colored robes. The composition is balanced, with the crosses forming a strong vertical axis against a blue sky. The scene is set outdoors, with a hint of landscape in the background.

title: Virgin and Child
description: The painting depicts the Virgin Mary tenderly holding the Christ child, framed by an arched opening that reveals a serene landscape. Rich red drapery envelops the figures, contrasting with the soft blues and greens of the background. The figures are rendered with delicate features and a gentle gaze, creating a sense of intimacy and devotion. The ornate golden frame surrounds the scene, adding a sense of grandeur and preciousness.

title: A Section of the Via Sacra, Rome (The Church of Saints Cosmas and Damian)
description: This painting depicts a sunlit scene of an ancient Roman street with the Church of Saints Cosmas and Damian as the central focus.  The architecture is rendered in warm earth tones, with crumbling plaster and exposed brickwork suggesting age and history.  Lush green trees frame the composition, and a figure in a monk's robe walks along a path in the foreground, adding a sense of scale and narrative. The sky is a clear, pale blue, contributing to the overall serene atmosphere.

title: Virgin and Child in an Apse
description: The painting depicts the Virgin Mary cradling the infant Jesus, flanked by two angels playing musical instruments. The figures are set within a grand architectural space, likely an apse, characterized by tall, arched elements. The Virgin's voluminous white robe dominates the center, creating a sense of serene grandeur. The overall palette is rich yet subdued, with the cool tones of the architecture contrasting with the warmer hues of the angels' garments.

title: Young Man Holding a Book
description: This portrait depicts a young man in a dark cap and robe, holding an open book. He is positioned in the foreground, with a detailed architectural background featuring Gothic arches and buildings. The lighting is soft, highlighting the subject's face and the pages of the book, while the background recedes into a more muted palette.

title: Hortensia
description: The painting depicts a still life with a potted hydrangea plant prominently featured on a table covered with a white tablecloth. To the left, a figure in a hat is seated on a sofa, engrossed in reading a book. The background includes a wooden door and a wall, creating an intimate interior setting. The overall mood is serene and domestic, with soft lighting and a focus on everyday life.

title: Portrait of an Old Man
description: This is a portrait of an elderly man, depicted from the chest up, facing to the right. The man wears a dark hood and a red garment visible at the neck. His face is weathered, with prominent wrinkles and a focused gaze directed away from the viewer. The lighting emphasizes the contours of his face, creating a sense of depth and gravitas.

title: Amida Manifesting in the Dharma-body of Expedient Means
description: The painting depicts a central figure, likely a deity or Buddha, radiating outwards with golden rays against a dark, textured background. The composition is dominated by strong diagonal lines emanating from the figure, creating a sense of divine power and movement. The colors are muted, with a focus on gold and deep blues, contributing to a solemn and spiritual atmosphere. The figure itself is rendered with intricate detail in its robes, suggesting a rich cultural and religious context.

title: Saints Matthew and Francis
description: The painting depicts two male figures, Saints Matthew and Francis, standing side-by-side against a gold background. Saint Matthew, on the left, is older with a long beard and wears a blue tunic beneath a yellow robe, holding an open red book. Saint Francis, on the right, is younger, dressed in a hooded brown robe, and also holds a red book. The figures are rendered with soft, flowing drapery, and the overall impression is one of solemnity and religious devotion, emphasized by the rich gold leaf.

title: Spring Landscape
description: This landscape painting depicts a serene pastoral scene with rolling hills, a gentle waterfall, and scattered trees. A small house is nestled in the distance, and a few figures and sheep populate the verdant fields. The sky is filled with soft, diffused clouds, suggesting a peaceful, perhaps early morning or late afternoon atmosphere. The overall impression is one of natural beauty and tranquility.

title: The Net Mender (Garnbinderen)
description: This painting depicts an interior scene with a man and a woman engaged in domestic tasks. The man, seated and smoking a pipe, is mending a net, while the woman stands behind him, also with her hands occupied. The composition is grounded by the wooden floor and furniture, with elements like a clock and framed pictures on the wall suggesting a lived-in space. The overall mood is one of quiet industry and domesticity.

title: Saint Mary Magdalen Holding a Crucifix; (reverse) The Flagellation
description: The painting depicts Saint Mary Magdalen seated centrally, holding a crucifix with Christ. She is surrounded by a retinue of angels playing musical instruments, with two kneeling figures in white robes at the bottom. The composition is rich with gold leaf, and the figures are rendered with soft, flowing lines, creating a serene and devotional atmosphere. The central figure of Mary Magdalen is draped in a vibrant red mantle, contrasting with the pale blue of her undergarment and the white robes of the supplicants.

title: Madonna and Child
description: This painting depicts the Madonna holding the Christ Child, who is reaching up to her face. The figures are rendered with soft, rounded forms against a rich gold background. The Madonna wears a dark robe and a blue veil, while the child is dressed in pink. The composition is centered and formal, with the figures occupying the majority of the frame.

title: Saints Michael and Francis
description: This painting depicts Saint Michael on the left, battling a dragon, and Saint Francis on the right, displaying stigmata. Saint Michael is clad in flowing blue robes and holds a cross and shield, while Saint Francis wears a brown Franciscan habit. The background is a rich, textured gold, with arched niches framing each figure. The overall impression is one of religious devotion and the triumph of good over evil.

title: Study Head of a Young Woman
description: This painting is a portrait study of a young woman with flowing, wavy auburn hair. Her head is tilted downwards and to the right, with her gaze directed away from the viewer. The lighting highlights her pale skin and delicate features, contrasting with the dark, shadowy background and her dark clothing. The brushwork is visible, adding a sense of texture and movement to the hair and fabric.

title: The Dormition of the Virgin
description: The painting depicts the Virgin Mary seated centrally, surrounded by a group of figures in various states of prayer and contemplation. The composition is dominated by the figures, with the Virgin in a vibrant blue robe drawing the viewer's eye. The setting appears to be an interior space with architectural elements like columns and arches visible in the background, rendered in muted tones.

title: The Annunciation
description: This diptych depicts the Annunciation, with the Archangel Gabriel on the left and the Virgin Mary on the right. Gabriel, with large wings and flowing blue robes, gestures towards Mary, who is kneeling with her hands crossed over her chest. The scene is set in an interior space with architectural elements and a tiled floor, illuminated by a soft, divine light emanating from the dove of the Holy Spirit above Mary.

title: Portrait of a "Mamelouk"
description: This is a striking portrait of a man wearing a large, ornate turban and traditional attire, including a green sash and a red vest. He holds a decorative dagger in his right hand, and his gaze is directed towards the viewer. The background is dark and indistinct, serving to highlight the subject. The painting showcases rich textures and detailed rendering of fabrics and facial features.

title: The Temptation of Saint Mary Magdalen
description: The painting depicts a dramatic scene with three figures, centered around a woman with her eyes closed, leaning into a man who whispers to her. A third figure, partially obscured, is seen on the left, holding a skull. The composition is rich with draped fabrics in warm ochres and cool blues, illuminated by a dramatic light that casts deep shadows. The overall mood is one of intense emotion and spiritual struggle.

title: Portrait of a Man
description: This portrait depicts a man with dark hair and a serious expression, shown from the chest up. He is positioned in front of a window that reveals a landscape scene. His hands are clasped together in prayer, and the lighting emphasizes his face and hands against a darker background.

title: Virgin and Child with a Dragonfly
description: The painting depicts the Virgin Mary tenderly holding the infant Jesus, with the child reaching towards the viewer. A prominent red cloak drapes around Mary, contrasting with the muted green background. The figures are rendered with soft, rounded forms, creating an intimate and devotional atmosphere. The overall composition is centered and balanced, drawing the eye to the serene interaction between mother and child.

title: The Declaration of Love
description: The painting depicts an intimate scene between a man and a woman in an opulent interior. The man, dressed in a rich brown coat, leans towards the woman, holding her hand and appearing to make a declaration. The woman, adorned in a flowing blue and white patterned gown, gazes away, her posture suggesting a mix of receptiveness and perhaps shyness. The setting is luxurious, with ornate furnishings and a decorative canopy overhead, creating a sense of private intimacy.

title: Christ before Pilate; The Resurrection
description: This painting depicts a scene with multiple figures, including Christ in the center, being led by guards. The composition is dense with figures interacting, and a landscape is visible through an opening on the left. The overall impression is one of narrative storytelling, with rich colors and detailed rendering of clothing and expressions.

title: L'Arlésienne: Madame Joseph-Michel Ginoux (Marie Julien, 1848-1911)
description: This portrait depicts a woman seated at a table, looking pensively to the side with her hand resting on her cheek. The background is a vibrant, textured yellow, contrasting with the subject's dark clothing and the green and orange elements of the table and chair. Visible brushstrokes create a sense of movement and energy throughout the canvas, highlighting the subject's contemplative pose.

title: A Donor Presented by a Saint
description: This portrait depicts a middle-aged man with a stern expression, looking towards the right. He is dressed in a rich blue garment with a dark cloak draped over his shoulders. Behind him, a large expanse of deep purple fabric creates a dramatic backdrop, with a hint of a pale limb emerging from the left. The lighting highlights the man's face and attire, casting subtle shadows that define his features.

title: Christ Appearing to His Mother
description: The painting depicts a scene of Christ appearing to his mother within a Gothic architectural setting. Christ, in a vibrant red robe, stands with his hand raised, while his mother, in a dark blue habit and white veil, kneels in supplication. The composition is framed by an ornate arch adorned with sculptural elements, and a detailed interior space with columns and windows revealing a distant landscape.

title: The Adoration of the Christ Child
description: This painting depicts a scene of the Adoration of the Christ Child, with the Virgin Mary kneeling before the infant Jesus. A group of angels surrounds them, some singing from a scroll, while others look on with reverence. A bearded man, possibly Joseph or a donor figure, stands to the left, holding a candle. The background features a rustic stable structure and a glimpse of a landscape through an archway.

title: A Maid Asleep
description: The painting depicts a young woman asleep, her head resting on her hand, with a serene expression. She is seated amidst a richly patterned carpet, with a bowl of fruit and a pitcher on a table beside her. The scene is set within an interior space, with a doorway in the background revealing another room. The lighting is subdued, creating a sense of intimacy and quietude.

title: Salome
description: The painting depicts a young woman, Salome, seated with a platter holding a sword. She is adorned in rich, golden fabrics that shimmer with intricate patterns, set against a textured yellow background. Her pose is relaxed yet suggestive, with one arm resting on her lap and the other extended slightly, drawing attention to the ornate dagger on the platter. The overall impression is one of opulent beauty and a hint of danger.

title: Two Angels
description: This painting depicts a single angel in profile, rendered in a flowing orange robe against a dark blue background. The angel has golden hair and a halo, with large, feathered wings that transition from green to a lighter, almost white hue. The composition emphasizes the angel's movement through space, with its outstretched arm and the dynamic sweep of its wings.

title: Saint Christopher and the Infant Christ
description: The painting depicts Saint Christopher carrying the Infant Christ across a body of water, with rocky cliffs and a distant landscape. Saint Christopher is shown with a staff, wading through the water, while the Infant Christ sits on his shoulders, blessing him. The scene is rendered with a muted color palette and a sense of solemnity, with a small figure of a hermit visible on the right bank.

title: An Artist Painting a Heraldic Shield in a Cabinet of Curiosities
description: The painting depicts an artist seated before an easel, meticulously working on a heraldic shield. The scene is set within a crowded cabinet of curiosities, filled with various artworks, sculptures, and objects displayed on shelves and walls.  The composition is rich and detailed, with a sense of depth created by the receding architectural elements and the arrangement of objects. Light sources appear to be varied, illuminating different parts of the densely packed interior.

title: Virgin and Child with Angels
description: The painting depicts the Virgin Mary tenderly holding the Christ child, with two angels attending to them. The scene is set in a lush garden with a fountain on the left and an elaborate architectural structure on the right, suggesting a heavenly or idealized earthly realm. The background features a serene landscape with rolling hills and a cloudy sky, creating a sense of depth and tranquility.

title: Chrysanthemums in the Garden at Petit-Gennevilliers
description: This painting is a vibrant, close-up depiction of a dense garden filled with chrysanthemums. The composition is dominated by the lush foliage and the varied colors of the flowers, ranging from deep reds and oranges to whites and yellows. The brushwork is visible and textural, giving a sense of movement and life to the blossoms. The light appears to filter through the leaves, creating a dappled effect and highlighting the rich colors of the blooms.

title: The Coronation of the Virgin, and Saints
description: This altarpiece depicts the Coronation of the Virgin, with Christ placing a crown on Mary's head. The central figures are flanked by saints and angels, all set against a rich gold background. The composition is structured within a Gothic architectural framework, with pointed arches and intricate detailing contributing to a sense of divine grandeur. The vibrant colors and detailed rendering of the figures suggest a devotional and celebratory theme.

title: Léon Pallière (1787-1820) in His Room at the Villa Medici, Rome
description: The painting depicts an artist in his room, seated and playing a guitar near an open window. Sunlight streams in, illuminating the figure and the surrounding interior, which is filled with art supplies and furnishings. The view outside the window reveals a picturesque landscape with rolling hills and cypress trees. The overall impression is one of quiet contemplation and creative solitude.

title: Saint John the Baptist; Saint Lucy
description: The painting depicts two figures, Saint John the Baptist and Saint Lucy, standing within an architectural niche. Saint John, on the left, is shown with a staff and a gesture of blessing, while Saint Lucy, on the right, is partially obscured but identifiable by her attributes. The composition is balanced, with the figures occupying the central space, and the lighting creates a sense of depth and volume. The colors are rich and earthy, with deep reds and browns dominating the drapery and background.

title: Madame Grand (Noël Catherine Vorlée, 1761-1835)
description: This portrait depicts a woman with elaborate blonde hair adorned with blue ribbons, seated on a green velvet couch. She gazes upwards with a thoughtful expression, holding a sheet of music. The painting features soft, luminous skin tones and rich fabric textures, contrasted by a dark, indistinct background. The composition is framed within an oval, emphasizing the subject.

title: Jo, La Belle Irlandaise
description: This painting depicts a young woman with abundant, fiery red hair, gazing into a handheld mirror. Her gaze is directed slightly away from the viewer, creating a sense of introspection. The composition is dominated by the flowing lines of her hair and the soft rendering of her skin, illuminated by a gentle light source. The background is dark and indistinct, focusing all attention on the subject.

title: The Apotheosis of the Spanish Monarchy
description: This painting depicts a celestial scene filled with figures amidst clouds, bathed in a warm, radiant light. A central female figure, adorned in white, is surrounded by mythological beings and allegorical representations. The composition is dynamic, with figures in various poses suggesting movement and grandeur, all contained within an oval frame.

title: Bullfight in a Divided Ring
description: The painting depicts a chaotic bullfight scene within a divided arena, with a large crowd gathered to watch. Figures in traditional attire engage with bulls and horses, while spectators fill the stands. The sky above is a muted blue with hints of pink, and the architecture of the surrounding buildings is visible but indistinct.

title: Christ Taking Leave of His Mother
description: The painting depicts a somber scene with Christ on the right, facing three grieving women on the left. Christ's gesture and gaze suggest a farewell, while the women, particularly the one in the center, express deep sorrow. The figures are enclosed within an arched frame, set against a textured golden background, emphasizing the emotional weight of the moment.

title: Saint Paul with a Donor; Christ Appearing to His Mother
description: This diptych features two distinct scenes within architectural settings. The left panel depicts Saint Paul standing over a kneeling donor, while the right panel shows Christ appearing to his mother. Rich red and green robes dominate the figures, set against the cool tones of the architecture and a patterned floor. The lighting is relatively even, highlighting the figures and their devotional poses.

title: Saint Andrew
description: The painting depicts Saint Andrew, a bearded man with flowing hair, gazing to the left. He is dressed in draped robes of pale pink and blue, holding a red book in his hands. The background is a rich, textured gold, suggesting a divine or sacred setting. The composition is centered on the figure, with a strong emphasis on the saint's contemplative expression and the details of his attire.

title: Madonna and Child
description: This painting depicts the Madonna tenderly holding the Christ Child. The figures are rendered with soft, rounded forms against a luminous gold background. The Madonna's dark blue mantle contrasts with the vibrant red of the Child's garment, creating a sense of warmth and intimacy. The composition is focused on the central figures, with a sense of maternal devotion conveyed through their gazes and embrace.

title: The Life of the Virgin
description: This triptych depicts scenes from the life of the Virgin Mary, featuring religious figures in architectural and natural settings. The central panel showcases the Nativity with Mary, Joseph, and the infant Jesus, while the side panels depict the Adoration of the Magi and the Flight into Egypt. The overall palette is rich with earthy tones and vibrant reds and blues, set against detailed landscapes and classical architecture.

title: The Annunciation
description: This painting depicts the Annunciation within an interior space. An angel, with large feathered wings, stands to the left, gesturing towards the Virgin Mary who is seated and reading a book. The scene is illuminated by light streaming from a window, casting subtle shadows and highlighting the rich details of the room and the figures' robes. The composition is balanced, with the figures positioned on opposite sides of the central furniture.

title: The Apotheosis of the Spanish Monarchy
description: This painting depicts a grand allegorical scene with numerous figures in a swirling, cloud-filled sky, suggesting a celestial or divine event. A central figure, possibly a queen or goddess, is seated amidst a gathering of mythological beings and cherubs. The composition is dynamic, with figures in various poses of movement and exaltation, illuminated by a dramatic light source that casts deep shadows.

title: The Crucifixion
description: This painting depicts the crucifixion of Jesus Christ, with figures of mourners and soldiers gathered at the base of the cross. The scene is set against a detailed backdrop of a city with architectural elements and a hilly landscape under a dramatic sky. The composition focuses on the central figure of Christ and the emotional responses of those below, rendered with meticulous detail and rich colors.

title: The Englishman (William Tom Warrener, 1861-1934) at the Moulin Rouge
description: This painting depicts a man in a top hat, likely at the Moulin Rouge, engaged in conversation with two figures whose faces are partially obscured. The composition is dominated by the man's profile and his dark suit, contrasted with the lighter tones of the other figures and the warm, textured background.  The artist employs visible brushstrokes, creating a sense of movement and immediacy.

title: The Parable of the Mote and the Beam
description: The painting depicts two figures in a dramatic, architectural setting with a cloudy sky above. One figure, seated and bearded, gestures towards the other, who stands and leans forward, seemingly in response. The composition is dominated by earthy tones and rough textures, with a strong diagonal beam cutting across the upper portion of the scene. The light creates significant contrasts, highlighting the faces and gestures of the figures against the darker surroundings.

title: Joseph Interpreting the Dreams of Pharaoh
description: This painting depicts a grand architectural setting with a procession of figures.  The composition is rich with detail, featuring ornate columns, a decorated ceiling, and a tiled floor.  A group of people, including figures in elaborate attire and soldiers, are gathered, suggesting a significant event.  The overall impression is one of historical narrative within a formal, structured environment.

title: Katharina Merian
description: This portrait depicts a woman with a serene expression, wearing a dark dress and a distinctive wide-brimmed hat adorned with gold accents. A prominent gold chain with a pendant rests on her white collar, and her hands, adorned with rings, are clasped in front of her. The background is a textured, vibrant green, creating a stark contrast with the sitter's dark attire.

title: Jalais Hill, Pontoise
description: This painting depicts a sun-drenched rural landscape with rolling hills, cultivated fields, and a cluster of white houses. A dirt path winds through the foreground, leading the eye towards the village nestled in the valley. Two figures, one in a light-colored dress and the other in darker attire, stand on the path, adding a sense of human presence to the serene scene. The sky is filled with dramatic, billowing clouds against a bright blue backdrop.

title: The Sofa
description: The painting depicts two women reclining on a sofa, with one looking directly at the viewer while the other gazes upwards. The composition is dominated by warm, earthy tones, with splashes of pink and pale blue in the figures' clothing. The brushwork is loose and visible, creating a sense of immediacy and texture. The figures are rendered with a focus on their poses and expressions, set against a backdrop of muted, textured lines.

title: The Martyrdom of Saint Lawrence; (reverse) Giving Drink to the Thirsty
description: This painting depicts a dramatic scene of martyrdom, with a central figure bound to a rack. Several figures surround him, some appearing to inflict pain, while others observe. The composition is filled with figures and action, set against a textured, golden background. The colors are rich, with prominent reds, yellows, and greens, and the lighting creates a sense of intensity.

title: Lions in a Mountainous Landscape
description: The painting depicts a pride of lions resting in a dramatic, dimly lit mountainous landscape. Warm, earthy tones dominate the scene, highlighting the powerful forms of the lions against a dark, atmospheric background. The composition is asymmetrical, with the lions clustered together, creating a sense of contained energy. The lighting emphasizes the muscularity and texture of the animals, with prominent shadows adding to the dramatic mood.

title: The Annunciation
description: The painting depicts the Annunciation with the Archangel Gabriel kneeling on the left and the Virgin Mary standing within an architectural portal on the right.  Rich red and blue robes dominate the figures, contrasting with the muted earthy tones of the ground and the pale stone architecture.  The scene is bathed in a soft, almost ethereal light that highlights the divine presence of the dove descending from above.  The detailed rendering of the foliage and architectural elements creates a sense of depth and realism.

title: The Flight into Egypt
description: The painting depicts the Holy Family, with Mary holding the infant Jesus and Joseph wading through water, guided by cherubs in the sky. The scene is set in a lush, natural landscape with a dark, textured tree dominating the left side and a serene sky with clouds above. The figures are rendered with soft, rounded forms, and the overall impression is one of gentle movement and divine presence.

title: Melancholy Courtesan
description: The painting depicts a woman in profile, draped in a richly patterned blue veil adorned with golden peacock motifs. She is seated, with one arm bent and her hand near her mouth, conveying a sense of introspection or melancholy. The background is a muted green, and the composition is framed by a vibrant red border. Intricate jewelry and detailed fabric textures are evident.

title: Honfleur
description: The painting depicts a harbor scene with several sailboats and a larger sailing ship docked. The water reflects the muted colors of the sky and the surrounding buildings, creating a serene atmosphere. The composition is dominated by the masts and rigging of the ships, with a town visible in the background.

title: Portrait of a Woman of the Slosgin Family of Cologne
description: This is a formal portrait of a woman from the Slosgin family, painted in 1557. She is depicted from the chest up, wearing a dark dress with fur-trimmed sleeves and elaborate gold jewelry. Her gaze is directed slightly to the left, and her hands are delicately posed, holding a glove and a chain. A coat of arms is visible on the right side of the composition.

title: Madonna and Child
description: The painting depicts the Madonna holding the Christ child, both rendered with serene expressions against a gilded background. The Madonna is draped in a deep blue robe, while the child wears a reddish-orange tunic. The composition is frontal and centered, with the figures forming a stable pyramidal structure. The gold leaf background and the stylized rendering of the figures suggest an iconographic style.

title: Virgin and Child
description: This painting depicts the Virgin Mary tenderly holding the Christ child. The figures are rendered with soft, pale skin tones, contrasting with the vibrant red of Mary's veil and gown. Behind them, a detailed landscape unfolds with rolling hills, trees, and a distant castle, rendered in muted greens and blues. The composition is intimate, focusing on the maternal bond between mother and child.

title: The Toilette of Venus
description: The painting depicts Venus reclining on luxurious fabrics, attended by cherubs who adorn her with pearls and ribbons. Rich drapery in deep green frames the scene, contrasting with the soft, pale skin of Venus and the rosy hues of the cherubs. The composition is filled with opulent details, including ornate furniture and symbolic doves, creating an atmosphere of sensual beauty and divine grooming.

title: The Last Supper
description: This triptych depicts the Last Supper in the central panel, with scenes of Christ's Passion on the wings. The central scene features Jesus at a table surrounded by his disciples, rendered with rich colors and detailed architectural elements. The left wing shows a procession and a military scene, while the right wing portrays a landscape with tents and figures, possibly representing the betrayal and arrest of Christ. The overall composition is detailed and narrative, with a focus on the dramatic events unfolding.

title: Prayer in the Mosque
description: The painting depicts a serene interior of a mosque, characterized by a long hall lined with columns and arches. Figures in traditional attire are engaged in prayer, arranged in rows, while pigeons flutter within the space. The architecture features a striking pattern of red and white striped arches and columns, bathed in a warm, diffused light that creates a sense of depth and tranquility.

title: Virgin and Child in a Niche
description: The painting depicts the Virgin Mary tenderly holding the Christ child within a Gothic architectural niche. A vibrant red robe drapes around Mary, contrasting with the intricate, pale stone tracery of the surrounding architecture. The figures are bathed in a soft light that highlights their forms and the rich details of the background tapestry. The overall impression is one of serene devotion and solemnity.

title: Market by the Seashore
description: The painting depicts a bustling seaside scene under a dramatic, overcast sky. A group of figures, some carrying baskets and one on horseback, are gathered on a sandy incline. In the distance, boats are visible on the water, and a shipwrecked vessel rests on the shore. The overall impression is one of activity and a slightly somber, atmospheric mood.

title: Still Life with a Vase of Flowers, Melon, Peaches, and Grapes
description: This still life painting features a bountiful arrangement of fruits and flowers. A vase filled with white and blue flowers sits to the left, accompanied by a cluster of green grapes and several ripe peaches. To the right, a sliced melon reveals its vibrant orange flesh, with a fly resting on its surface. The composition is set against a dark, neutral background, emphasizing the richness of the depicted objects.

title: Salome with the Head of Saint John the Baptist
description: The painting depicts Salome, a young woman with elaborate braided hair and rich attire, holding a silver platter. On the platter rests the severed head of Saint John the Baptist, presented by a disembodied hand. The figures are set against a dark, almost black background, which emphasizes their forms and the dramatic subject matter. The colors are rich and jewel-toned, with a focus on the vibrant greens and reds of Salome's clothing and the pale tones of the head.

title: Saint Ansanus
description: The painting depicts a young man, Saint Ansanus, with a halo, holding a staff with a dark banner. He is dressed in a green tunic and a reddish-brown cloak. The background is a textured gold leaf, typical of early Renaissance religious art. The figure is rendered with soft, rounded features and a serene, direct gaze.

title: Madonna and Child Enthroned with Saints
description: The painting depicts a central Madonna and Child enthroned, flanked by saints within architectural niches. Rich gold ornamentation and detailed drapery characterize the figures, set against a backdrop of patterned gold. The overall impression is one of solemnity and divine presence, with a clear emphasis on religious figures and symbolism.

title: A Woman Reading
description: The painting depicts a young woman engrossed in reading a book while seated outdoors. She is positioned in profile, with her head tilted down and her hand resting on her cheek, conveying a sense of quiet contemplation. The background features a muted landscape with a body of water and a distant boat, rendered with visible brushstrokes that create a textured, atmospheric effect. The overall impression is one of peaceful solitude and intellectual engagement.

title: The Birth and Naming of Saint John the Baptist; (reverse) Trompe-l'oeil with Painting of The Man of Sorrows
description: This painting depicts a domestic scene with figures gathered around a newborn baby. The composition is divided into interior and exterior spaces, with architectural elements framing the central action. Rich red drapery dominates the background of the interior, contrasting with the cooler tones of the figures' clothing and the surrounding architecture. A peacock stands prominently in the foreground of the exterior section, adding a touch of natural detail.

title: Saint Reparata Tortured with Red-Hot Irons
description: This painting depicts a scene of martyrdom, with Saint Reparata being tortured with red-hot irons. The composition is divided, with figures in an interior space on the left and a more open, dramatic scene on the right against a gold background. The use of warm colors, particularly the reds and oranges of the fire and drapery, contrasts with the cooler tones of the saint's skin and the background. The overall effect is one of intense suffering and divine intervention, suggested by the presence of an angel.

title: Guillaume Budé (1467-1540)
description: This portrait depicts a man in dark attire, wearing a black cap and gown, seated and engaged in writing. He holds a quill in his right hand, poised over an open book, while his left hand rests on the pages. The background is a vibrant, textured blue, contrasting with the somber tones of the subject's clothing and the warm hues of the book.
